Dance of Steel.name: Dance of Steel
Dance of Steel.flavor: Testing your enemy’s defenses as you weave your weapon in and out, you lash out with a sudden attack that leaves your foe in pain.
Dance of Steel.weapon: If you’re wielding a polearm or a heavy blade, the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.

Shield Slam.name: Shield Slam
Shield Slam.flavor: You follow up a successful attack by slamming your shield into the enemy, knocking him aside.
Shield Slam.trigger: You hit an enemy with a melee attack
Shield Slam.requirement: You must be using a shield.
Shield Slam.onHit: You push the target 1 square and knock it prone.

Rain of Blows.name: Rain of Blows
Rain of Blows.flavor: You become a blur of motion, raining a series of blows upon your opponent.
Rain of Blows.attack: Strength vs. AC. Make the attack twice against the target.
Rain of Blows.weapon: If you’re wielding a flail, a light blade, or a spear and have Dexterity 15 or higher, make the attack a third time against either the target or a different creature.

Shield Bash.name: Shield Bash
Shield Bash.flavor: You knock your adversary off balance with your shield and follow up with a strike.
Shield Bash.requirement: You must be using a shield.
Shield Bash.onHit: 1d10 + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target 1 square and knock it prone.
Shield Bash.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Sweeping Blow.name: Sweeping Blow
Sweeping Blow.flavor: Seeing your enemies press in, you swing your weapon in a wide arc, striking many of your foes at once.
Sweeping Blow.target: Each enemy you can see in the burst
Sweeping Blow.weapon: If you’re wielding an axe, a flail, a heavy blade, or a pick, you gain a bonus to the attack roll equal to one-half your Strength modifier.

Battering Ram.name: Battering Ram
Battering Ram.flavor: You pick up the enemy you are grappling and run it headfirst into another foe.
Battering Ram.effect: You move your speed, pulling the target with you. The target remains grabbed, and you do not provoke an opportunity attack from the target for this movement.
Battering Ram.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you knock the target prone. If the target is adjacent to one or more of your enemies, it takes extra damage equal to 2 + your Dexterity modifier, and the enemies it is adjacent to are also knocked prone.

Griffon's Wrath.name: Griffon's Wrath
Griffon's Wrath.flavor: You land a heavy blow on your foe, exposing a vulnerable spot in its defenses.
Griffon's Wrath.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target takes a –2 penalty to AC until the end of your next turn.

Crushing Blow.name: Crushing Blow
Crushing Blow.flavor: Taking a full swing, you deliver a brutal blow to your foe.
Crushing Blow.weapon: If you’re wielding an axe, a hammer, or a mace, you gain a bonus to the damage roll equal to your Constitution modifier.

Armor-Piercing Thrust.name: Armor-Piercing Thrust
Armor-Piercing Thrust.flavor: You drive your weapon through a weak point in your foe’s defenses.
Armor-Piercing Thrust.weapon: If you’re wielding a light blade or a spear, you gain a bonus to the damage roll equal to your Dexterity modifier.

Not So Fast.name: Not So Fast
Not So Fast.flavor: Your adversary tries to slip away, but you sneak your weapon inside and keep him right where you want him.
Not So Fast.trigger: An adjacent enemy moves away from you
Not So Fast.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is slowed until the end of its next turn.
Not So Fast.weapon: If you’re wielding a flail or a pick, the target is also immobilized until the end of its next turn.

Trip Up.name: Trip Up
Trip Up.flavor: You tangle your enemy’s feet with your weapon.
Trip Up.trigger: You hit an enemy with a melee basic attack
Trip Up.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.
Trip Up.weapon: If you’re wielding a polearm or a spear, you can knock the target prone instead of slowing it.

Cleave.name: Cleave
Cleave.flavor: You hit one enemy, then cleave into another.
Cleave.onHit:
1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and an enemy adjacent to you other than the target takes damage equal to your Strength modifier.
Level 21: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.

Reaping Strike.name: Reaping Strike
Reaping Strike.flavor: You punctuate your scything attacks with wicked jabs and small cutting blows that slip through your enemy’s defenses.
Reaping Strike.onHit:
1[W] + Strength modifier damage.
Level 21: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.
Reaping Strike.onMiss: Half Strength modifier damage. If you’re wielding a two-handed weapon, you deal damage equal to your Strength modifier.

Tide of Iron.name: Tide of Iron
Tide of Iron.flavor: After each swing, you use your shield to shove your foe backward, and then you surge ahead.
Tide of Iron.requirement: You must be using a shield.
Tide of Iron.onHit:
1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you can push the target 1 square if it is no larger than one size category larger than you. You can then shift 1 square into the space that the target left.
Level 21: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.

Spinning Sweep.name: Spinning Sweep
Spinning Sweep.flavor: You spin beneath your enemy’s guard with a slashing strike, and then sweep your leg through your foe an instant later, knocking it to the ground.
Spinning Sweep.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you knock the target prone.

Steel Serpent Strike.name: Steel Serpent Strike
Steel Serpent Strike.flavor: You lash out with the speed of a striking serpent, hitting your foe in a vulnerable area that hinders its movement.
Steel Serpent Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is slowed and cannot shift until the end of your next turn.

Passing Attack.name: Passing Attack
Passing Attack.flavor: You strike at one foe, allowing your momentum to carry you forward into a second strike against another enemy.
Passing Attack.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you can shift 1 square. Make the secondary attack.
Passing Attack.secondaryTarget: One creature other than the primary target

Sudden Surge.name: Sudden Surge
Sudden Surge.flavor: You throw your weight into an attack, using the momentum of your swing to surge forward.
Sudden Surge.effect: You move a number of squares up to your Dexterity modifier (minimum 1).

Iron Bulwark.name: Iron Bulwark
Iron Bulwark.flavor: You parry one blow after another, denying your foes the satisfaction of getting a solid hit.
Iron Bulwark.effect: You gain a +1 power bonus to AC, or a +2 power bonus if you’re using a shield, until the end of your next turn.

Anvil of Doom.name: Anvil of Doom
Anvil of Doom.flavor: Like a smith’s hammer striking the anvil, you strike your enemy with a ringing blow that leaves it disoriented.
Anvil of Doom.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
Anvil of Doom.weapon: If you’re wielding a hammer or a mace, the target is stunned instead of dazed.

Chains of Sorrow.name: Chains of Sorrow
Chains of Sorrow.flavor: You attack your foe with a ferocious blow, then pivot and pull your weapon back to your body, unbalancing the enemy.
Chains of Sorrow.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to all defenses until the end of your next turn.
Chains of Sorrow.weapon: If you’re wielding a flail, the target takes a penalty to all defenses equal to your Dexterity modifier.

Giant's Wake.name: Giant's Wake
Giant's Wake.flavor: You make heavy, sweeping blows with your weapon, hewing your enemies left and right.
Giant's Wake.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. Make the secondary attack.
Giant's Wake.weapon: If you’re wielding an axe, you gain a bonus to the damage roll equal to your Constitution modifier.
Giant's Wake.secondaryTarget: Each enemy adjacent to the primary target and within range

Silverstep.name: Silverstep
Silverstep.flavor: You unbalance your enemies, knocking them back. As they recover, you shift to a more advantageous position.
Silverstep.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you can push the target 1 square.
Silverstep.weapon: If you’re wielding a spear or a polearm, you can shift a number of squares up to your Dexterity modifier.

Talon of the Roc.name: Talon of the Roc
Talon of the Roc.flavor: Like the talons of a great raptor, your attacks disable your foe and pin it in place.
Talon of the Roc.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.
Talon of the Roc.weapon: If you’re wielding a pick or a spear, the target also cannot shift until the end of your next turn.

Storm of Blows.name: Storm of Blows
Storm of Blows.flavor: You duck and weave between your enemies while slashing at them ferociously.
Storm of Blows.weapon: If you’re wielding a heavy blade or a light blade, you gain a bonus to the damage roll equal to your Dexterity modifier.
Storm of Blows.effect: After the attack, you can shift 1 square and repeat the attack against another creature within reach. You can then shift 1 square and repeat the attack against a third creature within reach. After the final attack, you can shift 1 square.

Cruel Reaper.name: Cruel Reaper
Cruel Reaper.flavor: You swing your weapon in a wide arc, carving into adjacent foes and causing them to scream in agony. Without warning, you reposition and follow up with a spinning sweep.
Cruel Reaper.primaryTarget: Each enemy you can see in the burst
Cruel Reaper.effect: You can shift 2 squares, and then make the secondary attack.
Cruel Reaper.secondaryTarget: Each enemy you can see in the burst

Adamantine Strike.name: Adamantine Strike
Adamantine Strike.flavor: Your powerful strike breaks through your foe’s slow defenses like a dagger through parchment, leaving it reeling.
Adamantine Strike.onHit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to AC until the end of your next turn.

Skullcrusher.name: Skullcrusher
Skullcrusher.flavor: You smash your weapon heavily into your foe, leaving it dazed and reeling.
Skullcrusher.onHit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
Skullcrusher.weapon: If you’re wielding a hammer or a mace, you gain a bonus to the damage roll equal to your Constitution modifier, and the target is blinded until the end of your next turn.

Cage of Chains.name: Cage of Chains
Cage of Chains.flavor: After landing a decisive blow, you skillfully use your weapon to entangle your opponent.
Cage of Chains.weapon: If you’re wielding a flail and you are adjacent to the target at the end of your turn, the target is restrained until the start of your next turn.

Hack ’n’ Slash.name: Hack ’n’ Slash
Hack ’n’ Slash.flavor: You swing your weapon in deadly arcs, relentlessly hacking and slashing at your foe.
Hack ’n’ Slash.weapon: If you’re wielding an axe, you gain a bonus to the damage roll equal to your Constitution modifier.

Fangs of Steel.name: Fangs of Steel
Fangs of Steel.flavor: You lunge forward and slash one enemy, then spin around and strike another foe with deadly ferocity.
Fangs of Steel.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage. Make the secondary attack.
Fangs of Steel.weapon: If you’re wielding a light blade or a heavy blade, you gain a bonus to the damage roll equal to your Dexterity modifier.
Fangs of Steel.secondaryTarget: One creature adjacent to the primary target and within reach

Thicket of Blades.name: Thicket of Blades
Thicket of Blades.flavor: You sting and hinder nearby foes with a savage flurry of strikes aimed at their vulnerable areas.
Thicket of Blades.target: Each enemy you can see in the burst
Thicket of Blades.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is slowed (save ends).

Dragon's Fangs.name: Dragon's Fangs
Dragon's Fangs.flavor: Like twin fangs piercing flesh, you deliver two attacks in rapid succession.
Dragon's Fangs.attack: Strength vs. AC. If you target only one creature, you can attack it twice.

No Mercy.name: No Mercy
No Mercy.flavor: You are a force of destruction on the battlefield, delivering devastating blows upon your foes.

Unyielding Avalanche.name: Unyielding Avalanche
Unyielding Avalanche.flavor: With unmatched speed, you test the defenses of nearby foes while expertly parrying their blows.
Unyielding Avalanche.effect: You assume the unyielding avalanche stance. Until the stance ends, you gain regeneration equal to your Constitution modifier while you are bloodied and a +1 power bonus to AC and saving throws. In addition, any enemy that starts its turn adjacent to you takes 1[W] damage and is slowed until the end of its turn, but only if you are able to make opportunity attacks.

Reaper's Stance.name: Reaper's Stance
Reaper's Stance.flavor: Every enemy within your reach falls victim to the ruthless precision of your attacks and suffers bleeding wounds.
Reaper's Stance.effect: You assume the reaper’s stance. Until the stance ends, whenever you use a fighter attack power, you can score a critical hit on a roll of 19–20, and you gain a power bonus to damage rolls equal to your Dexterity modifier. In addition, any enemy that starts its turn adjacent to you takes 1[W] damage, plus ongoing 10 damage (save ends), but only if you can make opportunity attacks.

Reign of Terror.name: Reign of Terror
Reign of Terror.flavor: After smashing your foe with a crushing strike, you cast your baleful glare upon the enemies that still stand before you, promising the same fate.
Reign of Terror.onHit: 6[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you mark each enemy you can see until the end of your next turn.

Force the Battle.name: Force the Battle
Force the Battle.flavor: Your skill with your weapon is so great that every thrust, parry, and counterattack takes its toll on your foes. Some of your attacks are so ingrained within you that they require almost no effort.
Force the Battle.effect: You assume the force the battle stance. Until the stance ends, your fighter at-will and encounter weapon attack powers deal 1[W] extra damage. In addition, once per round when an enemy starts its turn adjacent to you, you can use a fighter at-will attack power against it as a free action, but only if you are able to make opportunity attacks.

Supremacy of Steel.name: Supremacy of Steel
Supremacy of Steel.flavor: You are a blur, attacking your enemy so quickly it barely has time to do more than defend itself.
Supremacy of Steel.onHit: 6[W] + Strength modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, the only attacks that the target can make are basic attacks.

Storm of Destruction.name: Storm of Destruction
Storm of Destruction.flavor: Your skill is supreme, allowing you to rain destruction upon multiple foes at once.

Unstoppable.name: Unstoppable
Unstoppable.flavor: You let your adrenaline surge carry you through the battle.
Unstoppable.effect: You gain temporary hit points equal to 2d6 + your Constitution modifier.

Get Over Here.name: Get Over Here
Get Over Here.flavor: You pull one of your allies into a more advantageous position.
Get Over Here.effect: You slide the target up to 2 squares to a square adjacent to you.

No Opening.name: No Opening
No Opening.flavor: You raise your weapon or shield to block an opening in your defenses.
No Opening.trigger: An enemy attacks you and has combat advantage against you.
No Opening.effect: You don’t grant combat advantage for the attack.

Interposing Shield.name: Interposing Shield
Interposing Shield.flavor: Seeing a comrade in trouble, you interpose yourself to stop a painful blow.
Interposing Shield.trigger: An ally adjacent to you is hit by an attack.
Interposing Shield.effect: The target gains a +2 power bonus to AC and Reflex against the triggering attack. If you are using a shield, the bonus increases to +4.

Iron Warrior.name: Iron Warrior
Iron Warrior.flavor: Like a tankard of bad ale, you don’t go down easy.
Iron Warrior.effect: You spend a healing surge, regain additional hit points equal to 2d6 + your Constitution modifier, and you can make a saving throw against one effect on you that a save can end.

Surprise Step.name: Surprise Step
Surprise Step.flavor: You dog your enemy’s footsteps, refusing to yield.
Surprise Step.trigger: An enemy leaves a square adjacent to you.
Surprise Step.effect: You shift into the square that the triggering enemy left, and you have combat advantage against that enemy until the end of your next turn.

Act of Desperation.name: Act of Desperation
Act of Desperation.flavor: The sight of one of your friends dying propels you into sudden action.
Act of Desperation.requirement: An ally within 10 squares of you must be dying, and you must not have spent an action point during this encounter.
Act of Desperation.effect: You gain an action point that you must spend this turn.

No Surrender.name: No Surrender
No Surrender.flavor: You refuse to go down, turning a death blow into a chance for victory.
No Surrender.trigger: You drop to 0 hit points or fewer
No Surrender.effect: You regain enough hit points to bring you to half your maximum hit points. However, you take a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of the encounter.

Covering Attack.name: Covering Attack
Covering Attack.flavor: You launch a ferocious attack at your enemy, allowing one of your allies to safely retreat from it.
Covering Attack.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and an ally of yours adjacent to the target can shift up to 2 squares as a free action.

Villain’s Menace.name: Villain’s Menace
Villain’s Menace.flavor: Choosing a worthy foe, you wound it with a strong initial attack, and then continue to harry it for the rest of the battle.
Villain’s Menace.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls and a +4 power bonus to damage rolls against the target until the end of the encounter.
Villain’s Menace.onMiss: You gain a +1 power bonus to attack rolls and a +2 power bonus to damage rolls against the target until the end of the encounter.

Comeback Strike.name: Comeback Strike
Comeback Strike.flavor: A timely strike against a hated foe invigorates you, giving you the strength and resolve to fight on.
Comeback Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you can spend a healing surge.

Crack the Shell.name: Crack the Shell
Crack the Shell.flavor: Seeing an opportunity, you strike your foe hard and fast, delivering a painful bleeding wound that hampers its defenses.
Crack the Shell.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target takes ongoing 5 damage and a -2 penalty to AC (save ends both).

Dizzying Blow.name: Dizzying Blow
Dizzying Blow.flavor: You crack your foe upside the head.
Dizzying Blow.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is immobilized (save ends).

Rain of Steel.name: Rain of Steel
Rain of Steel.flavor: You constantly swing your weapon about, slashing and cutting into nearby enemies.
Rain of Steel.effect: You assume the rain of steel stance. Until the stance ends, any enemy that starts its turn adjacent to you takes 1[W] damage, but only if you’re able to make opportunity attacks.

Shift the Battlefield.name: Shift the Battlefield
Shift the Battlefield.flavor: With supreme skill and great resolve, you maneuver your enemies where you want them.
Shift the Battlefield.targets: Each enemy you can see in the burst
Shift the Battlefield.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you can slide the target 1 square.

Victorious Surge.name: Victorious Surge
Victorious Surge.flavor: You strike true, and your enemy’s howl of pain is like music to your ears, making you forget about your own wounds.
Victorious Surge.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you regain hit points equal to your healing surge value.

Defensive Training.name: Defensive Training
Defensive Training.flavor: With a soldier’s discipline, you fend off attacks that would overcome a lesser person.
Defensive Training.effect: You assume the defensive training stance. Until the stance ends, you gain a +2 power bonus to Fortitude, Reflex, and Will.

Battle Awareness.name: Battle Awareness
Battle Awareness.flavor: You can sense danger before the threat is fully realized.
Battle Awareness.trigger: You roll initiative and dislike the result.
Battle Awareness.effect: You gain a +10 bonus to your initiative check.

Unbreakable.name: Unbreakable
Unbreakable.flavor: You steel yourself against a brutal attack.
Unbreakable.trigger: You are hit and damaged by an attack.
Unbreakable.effect: The damage against you is reduced by 5 + your Constitution modifier.

Stalwart Guard.name: Stalwart Guard
Stalwart Guard.flavor: You focus your attention on guarding your allies’ backs.
Stalwart Guard.effect: You assume the stalwart guard stance. Until the stance ends, allies gain a +1 shield bonus to AC while adjacent to you. If you are using a shield, allies instead gain a +2 shield bonus to AC and Reflex while adjacent to you.

Last Ditch Evasion.name: Last Ditch Evasion
Last Ditch Evasion.flavor: Through skill and luck, you narrowly avoid an attack but leave yourself perilously exposed.
Last Ditch Evasion.trigger: You are hit by an attack.
Last Ditch Evasion.effect: You take no damage from the attack, but you are stunned and take a -2 penalty to all defenses until the end of your next turn.

Into the Fray.name: Into the Fray
Into the Fray.flavor: You scream a fierce battle cry as you leap boldly into the fray.
Into the Fray.effect: You move up to 3 squares, but only if you can end the move adjacent to an enemy.

Warrior’s Challenge.name: Warrior’s Challenge
Warrior’s Challenge.flavor: You land a mighty blow that staggers your foe and sends it backward. With a wicked grin, you hoist your weapon and challenge the other enemies nearby.
Warrior’s Challenge.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target up to 2 squares.
Warrior’s Challenge.effect: You mark each enemy within 2 squares of the target until the end of your next turn.

Harrying Assault.name: Harrying Assault
Harrying Assault.flavor: You land a calculated blow on your enemy, and then change position to deliver a simple attack on that foe or another.
Harrying Assault.effect: After the attack, you can move a number of squares up to your Dexterity modifier and then make a melee basic attack.

Mountain Breaking Blow.name: Mountain Breaking Blow
Mountain Breaking Blow.flavor: You land a crushing blow, pushing your foe back, and press your advantage before any other enemies can retaliate.
Mountain Breaking Blow.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target up to 3 squares.
Mountain Breaking Blow.effect: After the attack, you can shift the same number of squares you pushed the target. You must end this movement adjacent to the target.

Vorpal Tornado.name: Vorpal Tornado
Vorpal Tornado.flavor: Like a whirling cyclone of death, you spin and strike one foe after another, driving each one back and knocking it to the ground.
Vorpal Tornado.target: Each enemy you can see in the burst
Vorpal Tornado.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you can push the target 1 square and knock it prone.

Indomitable Battle Strike.name: Indomitable Battle Strike
Indomitable Battle Strike.flavor: You will not be denied your enemy’s blood, and other foes that witness your savage attack know the ill fate that awaits them.
Indomitable Battle Strike.effect: You mark each enemy within 10 squares of you until the end of your next turn.

Diamond Shield Defense.name: Diamond Shield Defense
Diamond Shield Defense.flavor: Your shield becomes your staunchest ally.
Diamond Shield Defense.requirement: You must be using a shield.
Diamond Shield Defense.onHit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you take only half damage from the target’s attacks until the end of your next turn.
Diamond Shield Defense.effect: You gain a +2 power bonus to AC until the end of your next turn.

Boundless Endurance.name: Boundless Endurance
Boundless Endurance.flavor: You shake off the worst of your wounds.
Boundless Endurance.effect: You assume the boundless endurance stance. Until the stance ends, you have regeneration while you are bloodied. The regeneration equals 2 + your Constitution modifier.

Serpent Dance Strike.name: Serpent Dance Strike
Serpent Dance Strike.flavor: You weave through the battlefield, striking like a hungry serpent and sweeping the feet out from under your enemies.
Serpent Dance Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you knock the target prone if it is your size or smaller.
Serpent Dance Strike.effect: After the attack, you can shift 1 square and repeat the attack against another creature within reach. You can then shift 1 square and repeat the attack against a third creature within reach. You can then shift 1 square and repeat the attack against a fourth creature within reach.

Brute Strike.name: Brute Strike
Brute Strike.flavor: You deliver a powerful blow that rends flesh and shatters bone.

Devastation’s Wake.name: Devastation’s Wake
Devastation’s Wake.flavor: You thrash your foes with an array of strikes, and then unleash your fury a second time against any that are left standing.
Devastation’s Wake.primaryTarget: Each enemy you can see in the burst
Devastation’s Wake.effect: Until the start of your next turn, you can use the secondary power at will.
Devastation’s Wake.requirement: The power Devastation's Wake must be active in order to use this power.
Devastation’s Wake.trigger: An enemy starts its turn adjacent to you.

Reaving Strike.name: Reaving Strike
Reaving Strike.flavor: You make a powerful overhand strike, hitting your foe with such force that it stumbles backward.
Reaving Strike.onHit: 5[W] + Strength damage, and you can push the target 1 square.

Strike of the Watchful Guard.name: Strike of the Watchful Guard
Strike of the Watchful Guard.flavor: After landing a tremendous blow, you trail your enemy and make it think twice about turning its back on you.
Strike of the Watchful Guard.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you can make a melee basic attack against the target as a free action if you are adjacent to it and it either shifts or attacks one of your allies.

Paralyzing Strike.name: Paralyzing Strike
Paralyzing Strike.flavor: With a sharp thrust of your weapon, you leave your enemy momentarily paralyzed with pain.
Paralyzing Strike.weapon: If you’re wielding a pick, a polearm, or a spear, you can score a critical hit on a roll of 18–20.
Paralyzing Strike.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.

Appalling Crunch.name: Appalling Crunch
Appalling Crunch.flavor: Nearby enemies are so aghast at your remorseless attack that they see you as the most dangerous foe on the field.
Appalling Crunch.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and enemies adjacent to the target are marked until the end of your next turn.
Appalling Crunch.weapon: If you’re wielding an axe, a hammer, or a mace, enemies within 2 squares of the target are marked until the end of your next turn.

Harrowing Hammer.name: Harrowing Hammer
Harrowing Hammer.flavor: Your weapon crashes down on your adversary, forcing nearby enemies to acknowledge the threat you pose.
Harrowing Hammer.requirement: You must be wielding a two-handed weapon.
Harrowing Hammer.onHit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage, and each enemy adjacent to the target is marked until the start of your next turn.
Harrowing Hammer.weapon: If you’re wielding an axe, a hammer, or a mace, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

Defensive Resurgence.name: Defensive Resurgence
Defensive Resurgence.flavor: You buck up under the pressure and redouble your defensive efforts.
Defensive Resurgence.effect: You can spend a healing surge. Until the start of your next turn, you gain a bonus to AC equal to your Dexterity modifier.

Avalanche of Steel.name: Avalanche of Steel
Avalanche of Steel.flavor: You crash forward with the unrelenting fury of a landslide, letting your weapon be your guide and having no concern other than burying your foe.
Avalanche of Steel.requirement: You must be wielding a two-handed weapon.
Avalanche of Steel.effect: You grant combat advantage to all enemies until the start of your next turn.
Avalanche of Steel.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Shielded Sides.name: Shielded Sides
Shielded Sides.flavor: You whirl with your shield, concentrating on closing any holes in your defenses.
Shielded Sides.requirement: You must be using a shield.
Shielded Sides.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you gain a +2 power bonus to AC and Reflex and do not grant combat advantage to creatures flanking you.

Carve Initials.name: Carve Initials
Carve Initials.flavor: You cut deep and leave a meaningful mark.
Carve Initials.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Carve Initials.onHit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is marked until the end of the encounter or until you are knocked unconscious. No mark can supersede this one.

Crushing Surge.name: Crushing Surge
Crushing Surge.flavor: The feel of your weapon crunching against the enemy puts your heart back in the fight.
Crushing Surge.onHit:
1[W] + Strength modifier damage.
Increase damage to 2[W] + Strength modifier at 21st level.

Bell Ringer.name: Bell Ringer
Bell Ringer.flavor: You smash your weapon into your enemy, jarring his vitals.
Bell Ringer.onHit: The target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
Bell Ringer.weapon: If you’re wielding an axe, a hammer, or a mace, the attack deals damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

Dual Strike.name: Dual Strike
Dual Strike.flavor: You lash out quickly and follow up faster, delivering two small wounds.
Dual Strike.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Dual Strike.secondaryTarget: One creature other than the primary target

Footwork Lure.name: Footwork Lure
Footwork Lure.flavor: You press the attack, engaging your enemy before falling back and drawing him after you.
Footwork Lure.onHit:
1[W] + Strength modifier damage. You can shift 1 square and slide the target 1 square into the space you left.
Increase damage to 2[W] + Strength modifier at 21st level.

Parry and Riposte.name: Parry and Riposte
Parry and Riposte.flavor: You parry an attack and quickly counter with your own, throwing your foe off balance.
Parry and Riposte.trigger: An enemy misses you or an ally with a melee attack
Parry and Riposte.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target grants combat advantage to you and your allies until the end of your next turn.

Funneling Flurry.name: Funneling Flurry
Funneling Flurry.flavor: With snakelike strikes, you force two of your enemies to move where you want them.
Funneling Flurry.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Funneling Flurry.attack: Strength vs. AC (main weapon and off-hand weapon), one attack per target
Funneling Flurry.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you slide the target 1 square.

Distracting Spate.name: Distracting Spate
Distracting Spate.flavor: Your flurry of feints and strikes leaves your foe’s defenses unsteady.
Distracting Spate.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target grants combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn.
Distracting Spate.weapon: If you’re wielding two melee weapons, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.

Advance Lunge.name: Advance Lunge
Advance Lunge.flavor: You spring forward to make a quick attack.
Advance Lunge.effect: Before the attack, you can shift 1 square.
Advance Lunge.weapon: If you’re wielding a light blade or a spear, you can either shift 2 squares before the attack or shift 1 square before and 1 square after.
Advance Lunge.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. If you have combat advantage against the target, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.

Stop Thrust.name: Stop Thrust
Stop Thrust.flavor: As the enemy moves to attack, you respond by rapidly advancing and striking.
Stop Thrust.trigger: An enemy enters a square within 2 squares of you
Stop Thrust.effect: Before the attack, you can shift 2 squares.
Stop Thrust.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is immobilized until the start of your next turn.
Stop Thrust.special: If the target moved as part of a charge, it can attack you instead of the original target of its charge.

Hampering Flurry.name: Hampering Flurry
Hampering Flurry.flavor: Using both weapons, you attack your opponent’s legs and hinder him with painful wounds.
Hampering Flurry.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Hampering Flurry.attack: Strength vs. AC (main weapon and off-hand weapon), two attacks
Hampering Flurry.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage per attack, and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn. If both attacks hit, the second attack deals extra damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.

Pass Forward.name: Pass Forward
Pass Forward.flavor: With perfect timing, you slip by your foe without dropping your guard.
Pass Forward.effect: You pick an adjacent enemy and move up to your speed. As long as you end this movement in a square adjacent to that enemy, your movement does not provoke opportunity attacks from that enemy.

Harrier's Ploy.name: Harrier's Ploy
Harrier's Ploy.flavor: Your forceful attack promises your foe a pursuit that can end only when one of you is victorious.
Harrier's Ploy.effect: Until the end of the encounter, if the target moves, you can shift a number of squares equal to your Dexterity modifier as an immediate reaction.

Piquing Dare.name: Piquing Dare
Piquing Dare.flavor: With a precise and provoking blow, you mark your foe and defy him to ignore you on pain of further attack.
Piquing Dare.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage. If you have combat advantage against the target, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.
Piquing Dare.effect: The target is marked (save ends). If the target does not attack you on its turn while it is marked by this power, you can either make a melee basic attack against it or shift 1 square closer to it as a free action.

Knee Breaker.name: Knee Breaker
Knee Breaker.flavor: By smashing into your opponent’s legs, you make even the thought of moving painful for him.
Knee Breaker.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is slowed (save ends). If the target is already slowed, it is instead immobilized (save ends).
Knee Breaker.weapon: If you’re wielding an axe, a hammer, or a mace, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Constitution modifier.
Knee Breaker.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is not slowed or immobilized.

Blinding Smash.name: Blinding Smash
Blinding Smash.flavor: A sharp blow leaves your enemy seeing only stars.
Blinding Smash.onHit: The target is blinded until the end of your next turn.
Blinding Smash.weapon: If you’re wielding an axe, a hammer, or a mace, the attack deals damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

Savage Parry.name: Savage Parry
Savage Parry.flavor: With predatory speed, you violently parry, extorting pain as the penalty for your foe’s impudent attack.
Savage Parry.trigger: An enemy hits an ally with a melee attack
Savage Parry.onHit: Strength modifier damage, and the ally takes only half damage from the triggering attack.
Savage Parry.weapon: If you’re wielding an axe, a hammer, or a mace, your attack deals extra damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

Shooter’s Nemesis.name: Shooter’s Nemesis
Shooter’s Nemesis.flavor: The fact that your enemy is too cowardly to close to melee swells your confidence.
Shooter’s Nemesis.trigger: You are hit by a ranged attack
Shooter’s Nemesis.effect: You spend a healing surge and regain additional hit points equal to twice your Wisdom modifier.

Crumpling Slam.name: Crumpling Slam
Crumpling Slam.flavor: With a bellow and a mighty wallop, you hurl your foe backward and off her feet.
Crumpling Slam.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target 2 squares and knock it prone.
Crumpling Slam.weapon: If you’re wielding an axe, a hammer, or a mace, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

Scattering Swing.name: Scattering Swing
Scattering Swing.flavor: You whip your weapon in a wide arc, and those enemies you don’t send staggering must jump out of the way.
Scattering Swing.target: Each enemy in the burst you can see
Scattering Swing.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you slide the target 1 square.

Relentless Assailant.name: Relentless Assailant
Relentless Assailant.flavor: You get a boost out of pummeling your opponent.
Relentless Assailant.onHit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you can spend a healing surge.

Buffeting Torque.name: Buffeting Torque
Buffeting Torque.flavor: Your body and weapon spin as one, and jarring hits knock down those foes who fail to throw themselves out of harm’s way.
Buffeting Torque.requirement: You must be wielding a two-handed weapon.
Buffeting Torque.target: Each enemy in the burst you can see
Buffeting Torque.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and until the start of your next turn, any enemy that enters a square adjacent to you is marked until the end of your next turn and takes 5 damage. An enemy can take this damage only once per turn.
Buffeting Torque.weapon: If you’re wielding an axe, a hammer, or a mace, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

Cascading Catapult Slam.name: Cascading Catapult Slam
Cascading Catapult Slam.flavor: The brunt of your mighty swing sends your enemy bowling into another foe.
Cascading Catapult Slam.requirement: You must be wielding a two-handed weapon.
Cascading Catapult Slam.onHit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target a number of squares equal to 1 + your Constitution modifier and knock it prone. Then make a secondary attack.
Cascading Catapult Slam.secondaryTargets: One creature adjacent to the primary target
Cascading Catapult Slam.secondaryOnHit: 1d10 + Strength modifier damage, and you push the secondary target 2 squares and knock it prone. Then repeat the secondary attack against a creature adjacent to the secondary target.
Cascading Catapult Slam.secondaryOnMiss: Half damage, you push the target 1 square, and no secondary attack.

Precise Strike.name: Precise Strike
Precise Strike.flavor: You trade damage for accuracy to make sure you land an attack on your opponent.

Come and Get It.name: Come and Get It
Come and Get It.flavor: You brandish your weapon and call out to your foes, luring them close through their overconfidence, and then deliver a spinning strike against them all.
Come and Get It.target: Each enemy you can see in the burst
Come and Get It.onHit: You pull the target up to 2 squares, but only if it can end the pull adjacent to you. If the target is adjacent to you after the pull, it takes 1[W] damage.

Exacting Strike.name: Exacting Strike
Exacting Strike.flavor: You trade damage for accuracy to land a much-needed hit on your opponent.

Exorcism of Steel.name: Exorcism of Steel
Exorcism of Steel.flavor: You make a powerful chopping attack against your foe, forcing it to drop what it is holding.
Exorcism of Steel.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target drops one item it is holding. You can choose to catch the item in a free hand or have it land in your space.

Terrifying Impact.name: Terrifying Impact
Terrifying Impact.flavor: Giving an exultant battle cry, you pulverize an opponent and put the fear of impending doom in nearby foes.
Terrifying Impact.weapon: If you’re wielding an axe, a hammer, or a mace, the primary attack deals extra damage equal to your Constitution modifier.
Terrifying Impact.effect: Make a secondary attack, which has the fear keyword.
Terrifying Impact.secondaryTarget: Each enemy within 3 squares of the primary target

Boulder Charge.name: Boulder Charge
Boulder Charge.flavor: You and your sweeping weapon become like a stone rolling down a mountain, crushing anyone foolish enough to stay in your path.
Boulder Charge.requirement: You must charge and use this power in place of a melee basic attack. While charging, you can move through enemies’ squares but must end your movement in an unoccupied space.
Boulder Charge.targets: One creature and each enemy whose space you move through
Boulder Charge.attack: Strength vs. AC, one attack per target
Boulder Charge.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target 2 squares and knock it prone.
Boulder Charge.weapon: If you’re wielding an axe, a hammer, or a mace, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Constitution modifier.
Boulder Charge.special: You only gain temporary hit points for the invigorating keyword on the first successful hit.

Warrior's Urging.name: Warrior's Urging
Warrior's Urging.flavor: You call your opponents toward you and strike out with lashing blows.
Warrior's Urging.target: Each enemy you can see in the burst
Warrior's Urging.onHit: You pull the target up to 3 squares, but only if it can end the pull adjacent to you. If the target is adjacent to you after the pull, it takes 2[W] + your Strength modifier damage.

Smash and Grab.name: Smash and Grab
Smash and Grab.flavor: Your hammering blow distracts your enemy long enough for you to obtain a crushing hold.
Smash and Grab.requirement: You must have a hand free.
Smash and Grab.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you grab the target. Each time you sustain the grab, the target takes 1[W] + Strength modifier damage.
Smash and Grab.weapon: If you’re wielding an axe, a hammer, or a mace, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

Howl of Defiance.name: Howl of Defiance
Howl of Defiance.flavor: You respond to pain with a lionhearted shout and wild-eyed watchfulness.
Howl of Defiance.trigger: An enemy damages you with a melee attack
Howl of Defiance.targets: Each enemy in the burst you can see
Howl of Defiance.effect: The target is marked until the end of the encounter, until you are knocked unconscious, or until another mark supersedes this one. Until this mark ends, the target grants combat advantage to you.

Earthquake Smash.name: Earthquake Smash
Earthquake Smash.flavor: With a thunderous blow, you beat your adversary to the ground and send shock waves through the earth. Those waves toss other enemies aside.
Earthquake Smash.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is knocked prone and dazed until the end of your next turn. Make a secondary attack.
Earthquake Smash.weapon: If you’re wielding an axe, a hammer, or a mace, the primary attack deals extra damage equal to your Constitution modifier.
Earthquake Smash.secondaryTarget: Each enemy within 2 squares of the primary target
Earthquake Smash.secondaryOnHit: Strength modifier damage, and you knock the secondary target prone.

Menacing Stance.name: Menacing Stance
Menacing Stance.flavor: You seem ready to spring at any moment, forcing marked foes to devote more attention to you.
Menacing Stance.effect: Until the stance ends, whenever an enemy marked by you makes an attack that doesn’t include you as a target, that enemy grants combat advantage to your allies until the start of its next turn.

Rock Steady.name: Rock Steady
Rock Steady.flavor: You sink your center of gravity into the ground below you and grit your teeth. You are going nowhere.
Rock Steady.effect: Until the stance ends, you cannot be knocked prone, and if you are subject to a pull, a push, or a slide, you can reduce the forced movement by 1 square.

Strong Focus.name: Strong Focus
Strong Focus.flavor: Concentration improves your ability to accomplish feats of strength.
Strong Focus.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you gain a power bonus to Athletics checks and Strength ability checks equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Giant's Stride.name: Giant's Stride
Giant's Stride.flavor: You wade through the chaos of battle like a colossus, heedless of the foes about you.
Giant's Stride.effect: You can shift your speed. You ignore difficult terrain during this shift and can move through occupied squares, as long as you end in an unoccupied space.

Victor's Stance.name: Victor's Stance
Victor's Stance.flavor: You gain a surge of confidence and vigor each time a foe falls before you.
Victor's Stance.effect: Until the stance ends, each time you reduce an enemy to 0 hit points, you can use a free action to spend a healing surge, make a saving throw, or both. You gain a bonus to the saving throw equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Dance of Blades.name: Dance of Blades
Dance of Blades.flavor: You weave between two foes, driving them this way and that with a pair of attacks.
Dance of Blades.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Dance of Blades.onHit:
1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you slide the target 2 squares.
If you have combat advantage against the target, the primary attack deals extra damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.
Dance of Blades.effect: You can shift 3 squares and make a secondary attack.
Dance of Blades.secondaryTarget: One creature other than the primary target
Dance of Blades.secondaryOnHit:
1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you slide the target 2 squares.
If you have combat advantage against the secondary target, the secondary attack deals extra damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.

Driving Flurry.name: Driving Flurry
Driving Flurry.flavor: You force your opponent back with a sustained series of jabs, then use the break in his defenses to slip away.
Driving Flurry.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target 2 squares. You can then shift 2 squares.
Driving Flurry.weapon: If you’re wielding a light blade or a heavy blade, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.

Weaponmaster's Lure.name: Weaponmaster's Lure
Weaponmaster's Lure.flavor: You make a passing attack, throwing your foe off balance. With a shove, you send him stumbling away as you switch positions with him.
Weaponmaster's Lure.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Weaponmaster's Lure.attack: Strength vs. AC (main weapon and off-hand weapon), two attacks
Weaponmaster's Lure.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage per attack. If one attack hits, you can swap places with the target. If both attacks hit, you can swap places with the target and slide it 3 squares. If you have combat advantage against the target, each attack deals extra damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.

Turnabout Riposte.name: Turnabout Riposte
Turnabout Riposte.flavor: You make a quick parry on your ally’s behalf, take a swift jab at his assailant, and then spin into a new position.
Turnabout Riposte.trigger: An enemy adjacent to you hits an ally with a melee attack
Turnabout Riposte.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you can shift 2 squares and must end adjacent to the target.
Turnabout Riposte.effect: The ally takes only half damage from the triggering attack.

Dual-Weapon Supremacy.name: Dual-Weapon Supremacy
Dual-Weapon Supremacy.flavor: You land two vicious blows on your enemy, gaining a rush of confidence from the proof of your style’s superiority.
Dual-Weapon Supremacy.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Dual-Weapon Supremacy.attack: Strength vs. AC (main weapon and off-hand weapon), two attacks
Dual-Weapon Supremacy.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage per attack. If both attacks hit, the target grants combat advantage to you for the first attack you make against it before the end of your next turn.

Stabbing Torrent.name: Stabbing Torrent
Stabbing Torrent.flavor: You roil like a storm cloud, raining sharp blows on all enemies foolish enough to stand in your shadow.
Stabbing Torrent.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Stabbing Torrent.target: Each enemy in the burst you can see
Stabbing Torrent.attack: Strength vs. AC. If you’re wielding two melee weapons, you can attack each target with both your main weapon and your off-hand weapon.
Stabbing Torrent.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage. If you have combat advantage against the target, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.

Twofold Torment.name: Twofold Torment
Twofold Torment.flavor: Your carefully aimed slashes send two foes reeling away in agony.
Twofold Torment.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Twofold Torment.attack: Strength vs. AC (main weapon and off-hand weapon), one attack per target
Twofold Torment.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target a number of squares equal to 1 + your Dexterity modifier. If you have combat advantage against the target, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.

Quicksilver Stance.name: Quicksilver Stance
Quicksilver Stance.flavor: Like liquid metal, you flow wherever the gravity of battle carries you.
Quicksilver Stance.effect: Until the stance ends, you can shift half your speed (or your speed if you aren’t wearing heavy armor) and make a melee basic attack as a standard action. If you have combat advantage against the target of the attack and hit, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Gale of Steel.name: Gale of Steel
Gale of Steel.flavor: You cut through the ranks of your foes like a fierce wind.
Gale of Steel.target: Each enemy in the burst you can see
Gale of Steel.weapon: If you’re wielding a heavy blade or a light blade, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.
Gale of Steel.effect: You can shift 1 square and repeat the attack against any enemy you haven’t already hit with the attack.

Regnant Shout.name: Regnant Shout
Regnant Shout.flavor: Your battle cry wracks your enemies’ nerves and draws their attention to you.
keywords: Your battle cry wracks your enemies’ nerves and draws their attention to you. Daily Martial
Regnant Shout.effect: You gain a +1 power bonus to attack rolls against the target and it is marked (save ends both).

Subtle Cut.name: Subtle Cut
Subtle Cut.flavor: You deftly maneuver to precisely slash your foe, drawing its blood and slowing it with suffering.
Subtle Cut.requirement: You must be wielding a light blade.
Subtle Cut.onHit: The target is slowed and takes ongoing damage equal to 10 + your Dexterity modifier (save ends both).
Subtle Cut.onMiss: The target takes ongoing damage equal to your Dexterity modifier (save ends).
Subtle Cut.effect: Before and after the attack, you can shift 1 square.

Marking Barrage.name: Marking Barrage
Marking Barrage.flavor: With a volley of precise attacks, you wound nearby adversaries, showing them that this fight will end badly for them if they fail to take you down quickly.
Marking Barrage.target: Each enemy in the burst you can see
Marking Barrage.onHit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage. If you have combat advantage against the target, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.
Marking Barrage.effect: The target is marked until the end of the encounter, until you are knocked unconscious, or until another mark supersedes this one.

Transfixing Provocation.name: Transfixing Provocation
Transfixing Provocation.flavor: Your remorseless and skilled attack wounds flesh and confidence, giving you a lasting edge against your enemy.
Transfixing Provocation.effect: The target is marked until the end of the encounter, until you are knocked unconscious, or until another mark supersedes this one. Until this mark ends, the target grants combat advantage to you.

Marking Stance.name: Marking Stance
Marking Stance.flavor: Your very presence puts your foes off their guard.
Marking Stance.prerequisite: You must be trained in Intimidate.
Marking Stance.effect: Until the stance ends, any enemy that begins its turn adjacent to you is marked until the start of its next turn.

Brash Strike.name: Brash Strike
Brash Strike.flavor: With a battle cry, you throw your whole body behind your attack.
Brash Strike.onHit:
1[W] + Strength modifier damage.
Increase damage to 2[W] + Strength modifier at 21st level.
Brash Strike.weapon: If you’re wielding an axe, a hammer, or a mace, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Constitution modifier.
Brash Strike.effect: You grant combat advantage to the target until the start of your next turn.

Hesitation Slash.name: Hesitation Slash
Hesitation Slash.flavor: You flick your weapon one way, then the next, slashing your  opponent and making it unclear from which direction your next attack will  come.
Hesitation Slash.weapon: If you’re wielding a light blade, heavy blade or a spear, you gain a bonus to the attack roll equal to your Dexterity modifier.
Hesitation Slash.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target grants combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn.

Nimble Bladestorm.name: Nimble Bladestorm
Nimble Bladestorm.flavor: Your weapon becomes a whirlwind around you, striking so fast that your enemies have little chance to dodge.
Nimble Bladestorm.weapon: If you’re wielding a light blade, heavy blade or a spear, you gain a bonus to the attack roll equal to your Dexterity modifier.

Blades from All Angles.name: Blades from All Angles
Blades from All Angles.flavor: Your weapon appears to come from all angles at once, making escape impossible.
Blades from All Angles.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is knocked prone.
Blades from All Angles.weapon: If you’re wielding a light blade, heavy blade or a spear, you gain a bonus to the damage roll equal to your Dexterity modifier.

Unerring Blow.name: Unerring Blow
Unerring Blow.flavor: You position your attack such that your enemy has no chance to avoid it.
Unerring Blow.weapon: If you’re wielding a light blade, heavy blade or a spear, you gain a bonus to the attack roll equal to your Dexterity modifier.

Maneuvering Assault.name: Maneuvering Assault
Maneuvering Assault.flavor: Your weapon flashes quickly, letting you move your opponent exactly where you want it as it tries to dodge your attacks.
Maneuvering Assault.weapon: If you’re wielding a light blade, heavy blade or a spear, you gain a bonus to the attack roll equal to your Dexterity modifier.
Maneuvering Assault.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you slide the target a number of squares equal to your Dexterity modifier (minimum 1 square). In addition, the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.

Pinpoint Cyclone.name: Pinpoint Cyclone
Pinpoint Cyclone.flavor: Your weapon strikes nearby enemies with uncanny precision, inciting chaos while attacking with order.
Pinpoint Cyclone.weapon: If you’re wielding a light blade, heavy blade or a spear, you gain a bonus to the attack roll equal to your Dexterity modifier.
Pinpoint Cyclone.effect: The target grants combat advantage to you (save ends).

Insightful Strike.name: Insightful Strike
Insightful Strike.flavor: Your opponent is showing weakness, and your shrewdness allows you to exploit it.
Insightful Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. If the target is bloodied, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Wisdom modifier

Lunging Strike.name: Lunging Strike
Lunging Strike.flavor: You lunge at a foe that thought it was beyond your reach.

Flanking Assault.name: Flanking Assault
Flanking Assault.flavor: The presence of so many enemies overwhelms your foe, giving you the opportunity to land a vicious attack.
Flanking Assault.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage. For each ally adjacent to the target, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.

Lasting Threat.name: Lasting Threat
Lasting Threat.flavor: Following up your challenge with a solid attack, you force your enemy to engage you.
Lasting Threat.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is marked until the end of the encounter or until you are knocked unconscious. No mark can supersede this one.

Tempest Dance.name: Tempest Dance
Tempest Dance.flavor: You lunge from enemy to enemy, giving each a taste of your weapon as you pass.
Tempest Dance.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage. If you have combat advantage against the target, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.
Tempest Dance.effect: You can shift 1 square and repeat the attack against a second target. You can then shift 1 square and repeat the attack against a third target.

Create Opening.name: Create Opening
Create Opening.flavor: You draw your enemy’s attention, allowing an ally to slip away.
Create Opening.effect: The target is marked until the end of your next turn. The target can then make a melee basic attack against you as a free action, with a –2 penalty to the attack roll. One ally adjacent to the target can shift its speed as a free action.

Defensive Stance.name: Defensive Stance
Defensive Stance.flavor: Dropping into a cautious stance, you maneuver around your opponent’s attacks to get into position.
Defensive Stance.effect: Until the stance ends, you are slowed and gain a +2 power bonus to AC. Whenever an enemy misses you with a melee attack, you can shift 1 square as an immediate reaction. You can end this stance as a free action.

Shrewd Repositioning.name: Shrewd Repositioning
Shrewd Repositioning.flavor: An enemy’s attack lands, but you spot a way to better your tactics.
Shrewd Repositioning.trigger: You are hit by an attack
Shrewd Repositioning.effect: You can shift a number of squares equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Probing Attack.name: Probing Attack
Probing Attack.flavor: With a careful strike, you find a weak spot in your enemy’s defenses.
Probing Attack.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you gain a +4 power bonus to attack rolls against the target until the end of your next turn.
Probing Attack.special: When making an opportunity attack, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Rhino Strike.name: Rhino Strike
Rhino Strike.flavor: Rushing into the thick of battle, you smash your foes with your eager attack.
Rhino Strike.requirement: You must charge and use this power in place of a melee basic attack. If you’re using a shield, the movement during your charge does not provoke opportunity attacks.

Agonizing Assault.name: Agonizing Assault
Agonizing Assault.flavor: Your attack hits your adversary in a sensitive area, causing it to reel in pain.
Agonizing Assault.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is dazed and immobilized (save ends both).
Agonizing Assault.weapon: If you’re wielding a flail, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.
Agonizing Assault.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is not dazed or immobilized.

Bedeviling Assault.name: Bedeviling Assault
Bedeviling Assault.flavor: While your ally distracts your opponent, you land yet another blow.
Bedeviling Assault.effect: Until the end of the encounter, once per round when an ally hits the target with a melee attack, you can make a melee basic attack with combat advantage against the target as a free action.

Cometfall Charge.name: Cometfall Charge
Cometfall Charge.flavor: You leap through the air toward your foe, landing with a resounding crunch.
Cometfall Charge.prerequisite: You must be trained in Athletics.
Cometfall Charge.requirement: You must charge and use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Hounding Longarm.name: Hounding Longarm
Hounding Longarm.flavor: With a sharp jab, you shove your enemy backward, continuing to guard against him with your polearm.
Hounding Longarm.requirement: You must be wielding a reach weapon.
Hounding Longarm.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target 1 square.
Hounding Longarm.special: If you are an eladrin, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.
Hounding Longarm.effect: Until the end of the encounter, each time the target shifts or makes an attack that doesn’t include you as a target, you can shift 1 square and make a melee basic attack against the target as an immediate interrupt.

Pinning Smash.name: Pinning Smash
Pinning Smash.flavor: You pummel your opponent, knocking him to his knees. You then hold him down.
Pinning Smash.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is immobilized until you are not adjacent to it.
Pinning Smash.weapon: If you’re wielding an axe, a hammer, or a mace, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Constitution modifier.
Pinning Smash.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.

Agile Approach.name: Agile Approach
Agile Approach.flavor: You make a quick shift to a better position.
Agile Approach.effect: You can shift 2 squares and must end adjacent to an enemy. If you aren’t wearing heavy armor, you can shift 3 squares.

Settling the Score.name: Settling the Score
Settling the Score.flavor: When the attack hits you, you decide then and there to take your enemy out.
Settling the Score.trigger: An enemy hits you with an attack
Settling the Score.effect: You gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls against the triggering enemy until the end of the encounter.

Vigilant Protector.name: Vigilant Protector
Vigilant Protector.flavor: You sweep your shield out to give your allies protection.
Vigilant Protector.requirement: You must be using a shield.
Vigilant Protector.effect: Until the stance ends, you take a –1 penalty to AC and Reflex, but each ally gains a +2 power bonus to AC and Reflex while adjacent to you.
Vigilant Protector.special: If you are a dragonborn, your adjacent allies instead gain a +3 power bonus to AC and Reflex.

Stay Down.name: Stay Down
Stay Down.flavor: You’re not above hitting someone who’s down.
Stay Down.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. If the target is prone, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Dexterity modifier, and the target can’t stand up until the end of your next turn.

Fighter's Recovery.name: Fighter's Recovery
Fighter's Recovery.flavor: As you swing, you use your momentum to steady and center yourself, gaining vigor for the fight to come.
Fighter's Recovery.effect: If you have used all your encounter attack powers, you regain the use of a fighter encounter attack power you have used during this encounter.

Jackal Strike.name: Jackal Strike
Jackal Strike.flavor: Sensing your opponent’s flagging strength, you move in for the kill.
Jackal Strike.trigger: An enemy marked by you becomes bloodied

Pestering Wound.name: Pestering Wound
Pestering Wound.flavor: The injury caused by your attack tears open when your foe tries to maneuver.
Pestering Wound.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and if the target moves before the end of your next turn, it takes extra damage equal to your Strength modifier.
Pestering Wound.weapon: If you’re wielding a pick, the extra damage instead equals your Strength modifier + your Constitution modifier.

Hunker Down.name: Hunker Down
Hunker Down.flavor: You drop into a defensive posture, raising your shield to protect yourself.
Hunker Down.requirement: You must be using a shield.
Hunker Down.effect: Until the stance ends, you are slowed, but you gain cover against all attacks. You can end this stance as a free action.

Strength from Pain.name: Strength from Pain
Strength from Pain.flavor: The pain of your wounds opens the floodgates to your inner strength.
Strength from Pain.effect: You gain a +4 power bonus to melee damage rolls, Athletics checks, and Endurance checks until the end of the encounter or until you are no longer bloodied.
Strength from Pain.special: If you are a dragonborn, you instead gain a +5 power bonus.

Assured Strike.name: Assured Strike
Assured Strike.flavor: You pick out your foe’s weak spot and drive your weapon home with surprising force.
Assured Strike.target: One creature granting combat advantage to you
Assured Strike.weapon: If you’re wielding a heavy blade or a light blade, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.
Assured Strike.special: If you are a halfling, you don’t need combat advantage against the target.

Brutal Rebuke.name: Brutal Rebuke
Brutal Rebuke.flavor: By attacking your comrade, your adversary has called down your righteous ire.
Brutal Rebuke.attack: Strength vs. AC. If the target attacked you or an ally since the end of your last turn, you gain a +2 bonus to the attack roll.
Brutal Rebuke.weapon: If you’re wielding a mace or a pick, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Constitution modifier.
Brutal Rebuke.special: When making an opportunity attack, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Defender's Gambit.name: Defender's Gambit
Defender's Gambit.flavor: Inviting attack, you lure your enemy into letting its guard down for a counterattack.
Defender's Gambit.onHit: Until the end of your turn, you gain a power bonus to melee attack rolls and melee damage rolls against the target equal to your Wisdom modifier.
Defender's Gambit.effect: The target can make a basic attack against you as an immediate reaction, and then you make a secondary attack against it as a free action.

Slayer's Lunge.name: Slayer's Lunge
Slayer's Lunge.flavor: Scenting blood, you speed forward to finish your foe.
Slayer's Lunge.trigger: An enemy within 5 squares of you becomes bloodied
Slayer's Lunge.effect: Before the attack, you can move your speed.
Slayer's Lunge.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is marked (save ends). If the target is already marked by you when you use this power, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.
Slayer's Lunge.special: If you are an elf, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.

Bolstering Stride.name: Bolstering Stride
Bolstering Stride.sourceRef: Martial Power, Heroes of the Fallen Lands
Bolstering Stride.flavor: You rush to your friend’s side, ready to stand in his defense.
Bolstering Stride.effect: You move up to your speed + 2 squares, ending in a square adjacent to an ally. You then gain temporary hit points equal to 2d8 + your Constitution modifier.

Immovable Mountain.name: Immovable Mountain
Immovable Mountain.flavor: You plant your feet firmly, refusing to move.
Immovable Mountain.effect: Until the stance ends, if you are subject to a pull, a push, or a slide and you have moved no more than 2 squares since the start of your turn, you can reduce the forced movement by 2 squares.
Immovable Mountain.special: If you are a dwarf, you can reduce the forced movement by 5 squares.

Boggling Smash.name: Boggling Smash
Boggling Smash.flavor: Your solid blow momentarily costs your enemy its wits.
Boggling Smash.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target takes a –2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.
Boggling Smash.weapon: If you’re wielding a hammer or a mace, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Constitution modifier, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Skirmisher Pounce.name: Skirmisher Pounce
Skirmisher Pounce.flavor: You leap forward, skewering one foe and using your momentum to harry another.
Skirmisher Pounce.onHit:
2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you can shift 2 squares and make a secondary attack.
If you have combat advantage against the primary target, the primary attack deals extra damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.
Skirmisher Pounce.secondaryTarget: One creature other than the primary target
Skirmisher Pounce.secondaryOnHit:
1[W] + Strength modifier damage.
If you have combat advantage against the secondary target, the secondary attack deals extra damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.
Skirmisher Pounce.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Tap and Counterstrike.name: Tap and Counterstrike
Tap and Counterstrike.flavor: You tap your foe, holding back your full strength to keep its attention fixed squarely on you.
Tap and Counterstrike.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Tap and Counterstrike.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage. If the target makes an attack that does not include you before the start of your next turn, you can shift 1 square and make a secondary attack against the target with your off-hand weapon as an immediate interrupt.

Wild Strike.name: Wild Strike
Wild Strike.flavor: Throwing caution to the wind, you lash out desperately at your foe.
Wild Strike.onHit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you grant combat advantage to all enemies until the start of your next turn.
Wild Strike.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Controlling Thrust.name: Controlling Thrust
Controlling Thrust.flavor: After a vicious stab, you expertly corral your opponent with your polearm.
Controlling Thrust.requirement: You must be wielding a polearm or a spear.
Controlling Thrust.onHit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is marked (save ends).
Controlling Thrust.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is marked until the end of your next turn.
Controlling Thrust.effect: If the target takes a move action before the end of your next turn and is within your melee reach, you can make a secondary attack against the target as an immediate interrupt.
Controlling Thrust.secondaryDamage: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and cancel the target’s move action.
Controlling Thrust.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Protective Sweep.name: Protective Sweep
Protective Sweep.flavor: You swing your weapon around with care, and then take up a defensive posture.
Protective Sweep.target: Each creature in the burst you can see
Protective Sweep.weapon: If you’re wielding a flail or a heavy blade, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.
Protective Sweep.effect: You gain a +4 power bonus to AC until the start of your next turn.

Inspired Resurgence.name: Inspired Resurgence
Inspired Resurgence.flavor: Flush with success, you take a deep breath and relocate for your next attack.
Inspired Resurgence.trigger: An enemy marked by you is reduced to 0 hit points
Inspired Resurgence.effect: You can spend a healing surge and shift 3 squares.

Steadfast Stance.name: Steadfast Stance
Steadfast Stance.flavor: Standing resolutely, you let nothing cause you to falter.
Steadfast Stance.effect: Until the stance ends, when an attack causes you to take an effect that a save can end, you can make a saving throw against that effect as an immediate reaction.

Unyielding.name: Unyielding
Unyielding.flavor: Pain just goads you to greater heights of heroism.
Unyielding.trigger: You are hit by an attack
Unyielding.effect: You spend two healing surges and restore your hit points to their maximum value.
Unyielding.special: If you are a dragonborn, you also gain a +1 power bonus to attack rolls and all defenses until the end of your next turn.

Crippling Smash.name: Crippling Smash
Crippling Smash.flavor: You thrash your opponent, leaving him barely able to move.
Crippling Smash.requirement: You must be wielding a two-handed weapon.
Crippling Smash.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is slowed and weakened until the end of your next turn.
Crippling Smash.weapon: If you’re wielding an axe, a hammer, or a mace, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Constitution modifier, and you knock the target prone.

Meticulous Stab.name: Meticulous Stab
Meticulous Stab.flavor: Your precision allows you to strike at a tiny hole in your foe’s armor.
Meticulous Stab.weapon: If you’re wielding a spear or a light blade, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.
Meticulous Stab.special: When making an opportunity attack, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Smashing Hammer.name: Smashing Hammer
Smashing Hammer.flavor: Swinging from high to low, you build momentum as you smash into each foe.
Smashing Hammer.target: Each enemy in the burst you can see
Smashing Hammer.attack: Strength vs. AC. You gain a +1 cumulative bonus to the attack roll against each target after the first.
Smashing Hammer.weapon: If you’re wielding an axe or a hammer, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

Ballista Charge.name: Ballista Charge
Ballista Charge.flavor: Like a bolt fired from a ballista, you hurtle forward, transfixing your foe.
Ballista Charge.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is immobilized (save ends). Make a secondary attack against the target.
Ballista Charge.weapon: If you’re wielding a spear, the target is also dazed (save ends).
Ballista Charge.secondaryOnHit: 2[W] + Dexterity modifier damage, and you knock the target prone.
Ballista Charge.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Fighter's Resurgence.name: Fighter's Resurgence
Fighter's Resurgence.flavor: You brutalize your enemy and take heart from your prowess.
Fighter's Resurgence.effect: If you have used all your encounter attack powers, you regain the use of a fighter encounter attack power you have used during this encounter.

Ruthless Slaughter.name: Ruthless Slaughter
Ruthless Slaughter.flavor: Without pity, you butcher a foe already at a disadvantage, provoking your other enemies.
Ruthless Slaughter.effect: Each enemy within 3 squares of you, other than the target, is marked until the end of your next turn. If the attack reduced the target to 0 hit points, those enemies are instead marked until the end of the encounter, until you are knocked unconscious, or until another mark supersedes this one.

Blood Rush.name: Blood Rush
Blood Rush.flavor: Filled with bloodlust, you leap into the thick of battle.
Blood Rush.onHit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage. If the target is bloodied when you make the attack, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Constitution modifier.
Blood Rush.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Coward's Reward.name: Coward's Reward
Coward's Reward.flavor: You fling your weapon at the retreating foe, hobbling him as he tries to get away.
Coward's Reward.trigger: An enemy marked by you leaves an adjacent square
Coward's Reward.requirement: You must be wielding a melee weapon.
Coward's Reward.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn. Your weapon falls into a square of your choice adjacent to the target.

Desperate Strike.name: Desperate Strike
Desperate Strike.flavor: You strike wildly, frantic to finish off your opponent.
Desperate Strike.onHit: 5[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you take a –2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.
Desperate Strike.special: If you are a human, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Wisdom modifier.

Spinning Death Strike.name: Spinning Death Strike
Spinning Death Strike.flavor: You slash forward, and then bring your weapon around in a deadly arc.
Spinning Death Strike.requirement: You must be wielding a two-handed weapon.
Spinning Death Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. Make a secondary attack.
Spinning Death Strike.secondaryTarget: Each enemy within 1 square of you

Blade Storm.name: Blade Storm
Blade Storm.flavor: You weave through your foes, your weapon flashing as you strike through their ranks.
Blade Storm.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier + Dexterity modifier damage, and the target is dazed (save ends).
Blade Storm.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is not dazed.
Blade Storm.effect: You can shift 3 squares and repeat the attack against a second target. You can then shift 3 squares and repeat the attack against a third target.

Catastrophic Flurry.name: Catastrophic Flurry
Catastrophic Flurry.flavor: You become a tempest of violence, launching a barrage of lightning-fast attacks.
Catastrophic Flurry.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage per attack. If you hit twice, you deal 1d10 extra damage to the target. If you hit three times, you instead deal 2d10 extra damage to the target.

Mortal Wound.name: Mortal Wound
Mortal Wound.flavor: You open your up foe, unleashing a fountain of vitality from the wound.
Mortal Wound.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and ongoing 20 damage (save ends). Until the target saves against this ongoing damage, the target has a –2 penalty to saving throws.

Titan's Hammer.name: Titan's Hammer
Titan's Hammer.flavor: Your blow hits with ungodly force, knocking the sense out of your foe.
Titan's Hammer.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is stunned (save ends).
Titan's Hammer.weapon: If you’re wielding a hammer, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Constitution modifier.
Titan's Hammer.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is dazed (save ends).
Titan's Hammer.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Close the Gap.name: Close the Gap
Close the Gap.flavor: As your foe falls, you quickly move on to challenge a new enemy.
Close the Gap.trigger: An adjacent enemy marked by you drops to 0 hit points
Close the Gap.effect: You move a number of squares equal to your Dexterity modifier. You can mark one enemy that is adjacent to you after this movement. The mark lasts until the end of your next turn.

Phalanx Leader.name: Phalanx Leader
Phalanx Leader.flavor: You gather your allies behind your shield’s bulwark, and their presence gives you the upper hand.
Phalanx Leader.requirement: You must be using a shield.
Phalanx Leader.effect: Until the end of your next turn, while any ally is adjacent to you, that ally gains a +2 shield bonus to AC and Reflex and you gain a +2 power bonus to melee attack rolls.

Daring Shout.name: Daring Shout
Daring Shout.flavor: You challenge nearby enemies to attack you, bolstering your own stamina.
Daring Shout.target: Each enemy in the burst you can see.
Daring Shout.effect: The target is marked until the end of your next turn. You gain temporary hit points equal to your Constitution modifier + the number of targets in the burst.

Knockdown Assault.name: Knockdown Assault
Knockdown Assault.flavor: You smash your weapon into your foe so hard that the enemy loses its footing.
Knockdown Assault.onHit: Strength modifier damage, and you knock the target prone.
Knockdown Assault.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Combat Challenge.name: Combat Challenge
Combat Challenge.effect: Whenever an enemy marked by you is adjacent to you and shifts or makes an attack that does not include you as a target, you can make a melee basic attack against that enemy.

Bloodspike Sweep.name: Bloodspike Sweep
Bloodspike Sweep.flavor: You whip your weapon around in an arc as deadly as the sweep of a bloodspike behemoth’s tail.
Bloodspike Sweep.target: Each creature in the burst you can see
Bloodspike Sweep.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and ongoing 5 damage (save ends)
Bloodspike Sweep.weapon: If you’re wielding a flail, hammer, or mace, targets you hit are also knocked prone.

Salamander Lash.name: Salamander Lash
Salamander Lash.flavor: You use your weapon to expertly drive your foe into position for your attack.
Salamander Lash.effect: You slide the target 1 square into a square adjacent to you, and then make an attack against the target. You cannot slide the target into hindering terrain.
Salamander Lash.weapon: If you’re wielding an axe, pick, or polearm, you can slide the target a number of squares equal to your Constitution modifier into a square adjacent to you.
Salamander Lash.special: When you make a Combat Challenge attack, you can use this power instead a melee basic attack.

Hard to Kill.name: Hard to Kill
Hard to Kill.flavor: The tougher the battle becomes, the harder you fight. You shrug off minor wounds and resist even the worst effects.
Hard to Kill.effect: Until the stance ends, you gain a power bonus to saving throws equal to your Wisdom modifier, and while you are bloodied you gain resistance to all damage equal to 5 + your Constitution modifier.

Ruinous Assault.name: Ruinous Assault
