Ruinous Assault.flavor: Your weapons move with incredible speed and open deep gashes in your opponent.
Ruinous Assault.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Ruinous Assault.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier, and ongoing 5 damage (save ends).
Ruinous Assault.secondaryTarget: One creature other than the primary target
Ruinous Assault.secondaryOnHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier, and ongoing 5 damage (save ends).

Dancing Defense.name: Dancing Defense
Dancing Defense.flavor: Each time your blade connects you strike again—or feint, allowing you to dance away.
Dancing Defense.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Dancing Defense.effect: Until the stance ends, once per round when you hit with an attack using your main weapon, you can make a melee basic attack with your off-hand weapon against a different target or shift 1 square and gain a +2 power bonus to AC and Reflex until the start of your next turn.

Spinning Razor Strike.name: Spinning Razor Strike
Spinning Razor Strike.flavor: You move with such alacrity that your enemies can’t follow your movements: strike, step, strike, step, and finally one last strike to end your opponents’ threat.
Spinning Razor Strike.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Spinning Razor Strike.effect: You shift 1 square and make a secondary attack.
Spinning Razor Strike.secondaryTarget: One creature other than the primary target
Spinning Razor Strike.secondaryeffect: You shift 1 square and make a tertiary attack against a different target.
Spinning Razor Strike.tertiaryTarget: One creature other than the primary or secondary targets
Spinning Razor Strike.tertiaryAttack: Strength + 1 vs. AC (main weapon and off-hand weapon)

Punishing Storm.name: Punishing Storm
Punishing Storm.flavor: You strike twice at the foe, dance aside, and deliver a sudden strike with your secondary weapon to send the enemy sprawling.
Punishing Storm.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Punishing Storm.effect: If you hit at least once, you can shift 1 square and make a secondary attack.
Punishing Storm.secondaryTarget: One creature other than a primary target
Punishing Storm.secondaryOnHit: 1[W] damage, and the target falls prone.

Masterful Parry.name: Masterful Parry
Masterful Parry.flavor: You catch the enemy’s attack with your off-hand weapon and drive your main weapon into your enemy’s unprotected body
Masterful Parry.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Masterful Parry.trigger: An enemy marked by you would hit you with a melee attack.
Masterful Parry.onHit: You take half damage from the triggering attack and make a secondary attack against the same target.
Masterful Parry.secondaryOnHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is dazed (save ends). You can shift 1 square.
Masterful Parry.secondaryOnMiss: Half damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn. You can shift 1 square.

Adaptable Maneuver.name: Adaptable Maneuver
Adaptable Maneuver.flavor: A swift attack tests your enemy’s defenses and tells you whether you should drop into a defensive posture or strike again.
Adaptable Maneuver.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Adaptable Maneuver.attack: Strength vs. AC. Make the attack twice, once with your main weapon and once with your off-hand weapon.
Adaptable Maneuver.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage on the first hit. If both attacks hit, you can add 2[W] to the damage dealt or have the target take a –4 penalty to attack rolls (save ends).

Storm's Fury Strike.name: Storm's Fury Strike
Storm's Fury Strike.flavor: Your weapons pound into your foes to give you the room you need to face off with your true target.
Storm's Fury Strike.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Storm's Fury Strike.primaryTarget: Each enemy in the burst you can see
Storm's Fury Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is pushed 2 squares.
Storm's Fury Strike.onMiss: No damage, and the target is pushed 1 square.
Storm's Fury Strike.effect: You shift a number of squares equal to your Dexterity modifier and make a secondary attack.
Storm's Fury Strike.secondaryTarget: One creature other than the primary target
Storm's Fury Strike.secondaryOnHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and ongoing 10 damage (save ends).

Enemy Undone.name: Enemy Undone
Enemy Undone.flavor: Your opponent falls back beneath your attack’s ferocity, but it can’t escape you: You step forward to finish the job you started.
Enemy Undone.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Enemy Undone.attack: Strength vs. AC. Make the attack four times, twice with your main weapon and twice with your off-hand weapon.
Enemy Undone.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage on the first hit. On each additional hit, the target instead takes 1[W] damage. If all four attacks hit, the target takes 10 extra damage. You then push the target 1 square per hit and can shift 2 squares into a square the target occupied.
Enemy Undone.special: If you score a critical hit with this power, you can’t score another critical hit with it on the same turn.

Punishing Charge.name: Punishing Charge
Punishing Charge.flavor: As you charge into battle, your weapon opens a path to your chosen foe.
Punishing Charge.requirement: You must be wielding a two-handed weapon. You must charge and use this power in place of the melee basic attack.
Punishing Charge.effect: Any enemy that attacks you with an opportunity attack triggered by your charge takes damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

Savage Advance.name: Savage Advance
Savage Advance.flavor: Your enemy falls back beneath your savage attack, but you pursue to finish the job.
Savage Advance.requirement: You must be wielding a two-handed weapon.
Savage Advance.effect: Before the attack, you slide the target 1 square, and you shift into the square the target vacated.

Wicked Strike.name: Wicked Strike
Wicked Strike.flavor: Your weapon might be cumbersome, but it packs quite a punch when it connects.
Wicked Strike.requirement: You must be wielding a two-handed weapon.
Wicked Strike.onHit:
1[W] + Strength modifier + Constitution modifier damage.
Level 21: 2[W] + Strength modifier + twice your Constitution modifier damage.
Wicked Strike.special: You can use the power in place of a melee basic attack.

Who's Next?.name: Who's Next?
Who's Next?.flavor: When the foe crumples, you move forward to find your next opponent.
Who's Next?.requirement: You must have reduced a nonminion enemy to 0 hit points during this turn.
Who's Next?.effect: You shift up to your speed and gain a bonus to your next damage roll made before the end of your next turn equal to the number of squares you moved from your starting position.

Restoring Strike.name: Restoring Strike
Restoring Strike.flavor: Your weapon impacts with a satisfying crunch, filling you with new confidence.
Restoring Strike.requirement: You must be wielding a two-handed weapon.
Restoring Strike.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier + Constitution modifier damage, and before the end of your next turn, you can use your second wind as a minor action.

Brutal Advance.name: Brutal Advance
Brutal Advance.flavor: After throwing your enemy back, you charge to deliver the killing blow.
Brutal Advance.requirement: You must be wielding a two-handed weapon.
Brutal Advance.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target 3 squares.
Brutal Advance.onMiss: No damage, and you push the target 3 squares.
Brutal Advance.effect: After the attack, you can make a charge attack against the same target as a free action. If you hit with this attack, you deal extra damage equal to your Constitution modifier and the target falls prone.

Line in the Sand.name: Line in the Sand
Line in the Sand.flavor: You trace a line on the ground with your weapon, daring your enemies to cross it.
Line in the Sand.requirement: You must be trained in Intimidate.
Line in the Sand.effect: The burst creates a zone that lasts until the end of the encounter or until you leave the zone. Any enemy inside the zone grants combat advantage to you.

Inertia Strike.name: Inertia Strike
Inertia Strike.flavor: Your tremendous swing carries your weapon through one enemy and into anyone else in your reach.
Inertia Strike.requirement: You must be wielding a two-handed weapon.
Inertia Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and any enemy adjacent to you other than the target takes damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

Murderous Assault.name: Murderous Assault
Murderous Assault.flavor: You slam your weapon into your foe and surge in one smooth motion to swing again at another foe.
Murderous Assault.requirement: You must be wielding a two-handed weapon.
Murderous Assault.special: If you have combat advantage against the target, you deal extra damage equal to your Strength modifier.
Murderous Assault.effect: You can make a charge attack against a different target.

Mighty Surge.name: Mighty Surge
Mighty Surge.flavor: You dig deep to find the strength you need to overcome your foes.
Mighty Surge.effect: You can spend a healing surge, and you also gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses and a +1 power bonus to attack rolls until the end of your next turn. Until the end of the encounter, each time you spend a healing surge, you gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses and a +1 power bonus to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

Leaping Assault.name: Leaping Assault
Leaping Assault.flavor: You spring through your foes to rip apart an enemy with a savage swing.
Leaping Assault.prerequisite: You must be trained in Athletics.
Leaping Assault.requirement: You must be wielding a two-handed weapon.
Leaping Assault.effect: Before the attack, you move up to your speed. This movement does not provoke opportunity attacks from any enemy marked by you.

Hurricane Strike.name: Hurricane Strike
Hurricane Strike.flavor: You swing your blade around you and the momentum carries you forward so you can do it again.
Hurricane Strike.requirement: You must be wielding a two-handed weapon.
Hurricane Strike.primaryTarget: Each enemy in the burst that you can see
Hurricane Strike.effect: After the attack you can move up to 3 squares and make a secondary attack in a close burst 1.
Hurricane Strike.secondaryTarget: Any enemy in the burst that you can see

Warding Steel.name: Warding Steel
Warding Steel.flavor: You whip your weapon up to intercept your enemies’ attacks.
Warding Steel.requirement: You must be wielding a two-handed weapon.
Warding Steel.effect: You gain a bonus equal to your Constitution modifier to AC and Fortitude until the start of your next turn.

Bitter Harvest.name: Bitter Harvest
Bitter Harvest.flavor: You smash through the pressing host to set your eyes and your weapon on your chosen foe.
Bitter Harvest.requirement: You must be wielding a two-handed weapon.
Bitter Harvest.onHit: Constitution modifier damage, and you push the target 1 square.
Bitter Harvest.effect: You shift 1 square and make a secondary melee attack.

Toppling Finish.name: Toppling Finish
Toppling Finish.flavor: In one smooth stroke, you topple the enemy and bring your weapon back to plunge it down into its struggling body.
Toppling Finish.requirement: You must be wielding a two-handed weapon.
Toppling Finish.effect: You make a secondary attack against the same target.
Toppling Finish.special: If the target grants combat advantage to you, your attack deals extra damage equal to 3 + your Constitution modifier.

Battle Furor.name: Battle Furor
Battle Furor.flavor: When you draw upon your reserves, your fury rises and adds terrible weight to your attacks.
Battle Furor.effect: Until the stance ends, whenever you would regain hit points, you gain any hit points in excess of your maximum value as temporary hit points. Each time you regain hit points, you gain a bonus to your next damage roll equal to your Constitution modifier.

Slash and Kick.name: Slash and Kick
Slash and Kick.flavor: Your weapon tears through your foe, allowing you to follow up with a forceful kick to send the enemy sprawling.
Slash and Kick.requirement: You must be wielding a two-handed weapon.
Slash and Kick.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you make a secondary attack against the same target.
Slash and Kick.special: If you are bloodied, you gain a +4 bonus to your attack roll.
Slash and Kick.secondaryOnHit: You push the target a number of squares equal to your Constitution modifier and the target falls prone.

Time to Die.name: Time to Die
Time to Die.flavor: You’ ve battled this enemy long enough: Putting all your strength behind the attack, you fling the foe away and then leap after it to bring the battle to a bloody close.
Time to Die.requirement: You must be wielding a two-handed weapon.
Time to Die.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target a number of squares equal to your Constitution modifier.
Time to Die.onMiss: Half damage, and you push the target 2 squares.
Time to Die.effect: You make a charge attack against the same target as a free action. If this attack hits, in addition to the damage from the attack, you push the target a number of squares equal to your Constitution modifier and your target falls prone.

Wild Offensive.name: Wild Offensive
Wild Offensive.flavor: Your weapon moves with astonishing speed, leaving those you strike reeling in pain.
Wild Offensive.requirement: You must be wielding a two-handed weapon.
Wild Offensive.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier + Constitution modifier damage, and the target grants combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn.

Image of Death.name: Image of Death
Image of Death.flavor: As your enemies fall beneath your blade, you become the very image of death—a menacing presence sparking terror in all who behold you.
Image of Death.onHit: 5[W] + Strength modifier + twice your Constitution modifier damage.
Image of Death.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you gain combat advantage against any enemy marked by you.

Brazen Assault.name: Brazen Assault
Brazen Assault.flavor: Relying on your own resilience, you put yourself in danger, knowing that you can maneuver for a better attack.
Brazen Assault.prerequisite: You must be trained in Endurance.
Brazen Assault.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage + Constitution modifier damage, and the target is pushed 2 squares.
Brazen Assault.effect: You gain resist 5 to all damage, but grant combat advantage to all attacks. This effect lasts until the end of the encounter, or until you end it as a free action on your turn.

Revel in Pain.name: Revel in Pain
Revel in Pain.flavor: You grin widely as you focus the pain your foe wrought upon you and use it to move toward it with the hope of returning the pain.
Revel in Pain.prerequisite: You must be trained in Endurance.
Revel in Pain.trigger: An enemy within 4 squares of you damages you with an attack
Revel in Pain.effect: You can move your speed to a space adjacent to the target. If you do, you can make the following attack against the target.
Revel in Pain.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you gain temporary hit points equal to half the damage of the triggering attack.

Goad of Blood.name: Goad of Blood
Goad of Blood.flavor: Where others might fold beneath the agony of the enemy’s attacks, you allow that pain to spur you on to greater efforts.
Goad of Blood.prerequisite: You must be trained in Endurance.
Goad of Blood.effect: Until the stance ends, whenever you make a melee basic attack, you can use any of your at-will melee attack or melee encounter attack powers in place of the basic attack.

Resolute Shield.name: Resolute Shield
Resolute Shield.flavor: As you slash into your foe, you pull your shield into a defensive position between the two of you, guaranteeing that it absorbs at least some of your enemy’s attack.
Resolute Shield.requirement: You must be using a shield.
Resolute Shield.onHit:
1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you gain resist equal to your Constitution modifier against the target’s attacks until the end of your next turn.
Increase damage to 2[W] + your Strength modifier at 21st level.

Weapon Master's Strike.name: Weapon Master's Strike
Weapon Master's Strike.flavor: You shift your tactics to match your weapon’s strengths, maximizing its advantages to gain an edge against your foe.
Weapon Master's Strike.effect: Before making this attack, you may sheathe a weapon and draw a different one as a free action.
Weapon Master's Strike.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage. In addition, the target takes an additional effect based on the weapon you wield.
Weapon Master's Strike.axe: The target takes extra damage equal to your Constitution modifier.
Weapon Master's Strike.heavyBlade: Until the end of your next turn, you gain a +1 power bonus to AC against the target’s attacks.
Weapon Master's Strike.spearOrPolearm: Until the end of your next turn, the target provokes opportunity attacks from you when it shifts.

Battle Fury Stance.name: Battle Fury Stance
Battle Fury Stance.flavor: You throw your full weight into each attack, ruining your defenses but scoring a crippling blow with each strike.
Battle Fury Stance.effect: You gain a +2 power bonus to damage rolls with weapon attacks but suffer a -2 penalty to AC. The bonus damage from this stance increases to +4 at 11th level and +6 at 21st level.
Battle Fury Stance.special: This stance ends when you spend a healing surge. You can end this stance as a free action during your turn but not on the same turn that you activated it.

Deflecting Shield.name: Deflecting Shield
Deflecting Shield.flavor: As you hammer your foe with an attack, you move your shield to deflect its counterattack.
Deflecting Shield.requirement: You must be using a shield.
Deflecting Shield.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. The next time the target attacks you before the end of your next turn, one other enemy adjacent to you suffers damage equal to your Strength modifier.

Bodyguard's Stance.name: Bodyguard's Stance
Bodyguard's Stance.flavor: You stand poised, ready to block attacks made against your allies with your shield or, failing that, your body.
Bodyguard's Stance.effect: Whenever an ally adjacent to you takes damage, as a free action reduce that damage by 5. You must use this ability anytime you are able. When you do so, you take 5 damage; this damage that can’t be reduce of redirected in any way.
Bodyguard's Stance.special: You can end this stance as a free action during your turn.

Weapon Master's Gambit.name: Weapon Master's Gambit
Weapon Master's Gambit.flavor: As a master of many weapons, you use this simple attack form as the starting point for expressing your weapon’s nature.
Weapon Master's Gambit.effect: Before making this attack, you may sheathe a weapon and draw a different one as a free action.
Weapon Master's Gambit.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. In addition, the target takes an additional effect based on the weapon you wield.
Weapon Master's Gambit.axe: Up to 2 creatures adjacent to the target take damage equal to your Constitution modifier.
Weapon Master's Gambit.heavyBlade: You gain combat advantage against the target until the end of your next turn.
Weapon Master's Gambit.spearOrPolearm: You slide the target 2 squares and shift 2 squares to a square adjacent to the target.

Martial Redoubt.name: Martial Redoubt
Martial Redoubt.flavor: You sink into a broad fighting stance, whirling your weapon in an arc that disrupts your foe’s line of sight and allows you to knock aside your enemy’s attacks. While you protect your foes, this stance forces you to compromise your own defenses.
Martial Redoubt.effect: Until the stance ends, your allies have cover when adjacent to you. Your enemies gain combat advantage against you.
Martial Redoubt.special: You can end this stance as a free action during your turn.

Entrapping Shield.name: Entrapping Shield
Entrapping Shield.flavor: You tangle your shield with your foe as you lunge to attack. While it struggles to escape, you use your shield to deflect attacks against you into it.
Entrapping Shield.requirement: You must be using a shield.
Entrapping Shield.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, each time you are attacked, the target suffers damage equal to your Strength modifier if it is adjacent to you. This benefit does not apply to attacks that target both you and your target.

Defiant Shield.name: Defiant Shield
Defiant Shield.flavor: You twist and move in your current space, your shield held ready, as you prepare to block your foe’s attacks.
Defiant Shield.requirement: You must be using a shield.
Defiant Shield.effect: You gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses and are immune to forced movement.
Defiant Shield.special: This stance ends if you move during your turn. You can end this stance as a free action during your turn.

Weapon Master's Tactics.name: Weapon Master's Tactics
Weapon Master's Tactics.flavor: You shift to a new weapon, catching your enemy off guard as your tactics make a dramatic transformation.
Weapon Master's Tactics.effect: Before making this attack, you may sheathe a weapon and draw a different one as a free action.
Weapon Master's Tactics.axe: All enemies adjacent to you and the target take damage equal to 5 + your Constitution modifier.
Weapon Master's Tactics.mace: The target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
Weapon Master's Tactics.heavyBlade: The target’s attack penalty due to your mark increases to –4 until the end of your next turn.
Weapon Master's Tactics.spearOrPolearm: You slide the target to any other square adjacent to you.

Martial Supremacy.name: Martial Supremacy
Martial Supremacy.flavor: Your fighting expertise and experience allow you to use your most familiar attacks with unmatched accuracy.
Martial Supremacy.effect: Until the stance ends, whenever you use a fighter at-will attack power or basic attack that has the weapon keyword, you may reroll the attack roll. Use the second roll, even if it’s lower.
Martial Supremacy.special: This stance ends if you spend a healing surge. You can end this stance as a free action during your turn.

Battering Shield.name: Battering Shield
Battering Shield.flavor: You hack into your foe, leaving it defenseless for a critical moment. As another foe closes to attack, you ready your shield to deflect the attack into your target.
Battering Shield.requirement: You must be using a shield.
Battering Shield.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn. The next time an attack hits you before the end of your next turn, the target is also hit by that attack if it is adjacent to you. This benefit does not apply to attacks that target both you and your target.

Combat Agility.name: Combat Agility
Combat Agility.flavor: Your foe might think it has escaped you, but in its moment of triumph, you chase it down and make it pay.
Combat Agility.trigger: An enemy adjacent to you takes an action that provokes an opportunity attack
Combat Agility.effect: After the triggering enemy completes the action, you shift a number of squares equal to your Dexterity modifier. You must end the shift closer to the target than you were when you began the shift. Then make the following attack.
Combat Agility.onHit:
1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you knock the target prone.
Level 21: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.

Grappling Strike.name: Grappling Strike
Grappling Strike.flavor: You hew your foe with a simple attack and then grab it with your empty hand to keep it from escaping.
Grappling Strike.requirement: You must have a hand free.
Grappling Strike.onHit:
1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you grab the target. The grab ends automatically at the end of your next turn.
Level 21: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.
Grappling Strike.brawlerStyle: When making an opportunity attack, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Slash and Pummel.name: Slash and Pummel
Slash and Pummel.flavor: You follow up a quick slash of your weapon with a powerful punch from your free hand.
Slash and Pummel.requirement: You must have a hand free.
Slash and Pummel.onHit:
1[W] damage. Make a secondary attack against the target.
Level 21: 2[W] damage.
Slash and Pummel.secondaryOnHit:
3 + Strength modifier damage.
Level 21: 8 + Strength modifier damage.

Threatening Rush.name: Threatening Rush
Threatening Rush.flavor: You storm into the midst of your foes, ensuring that their attacks are directed against you.
Threatening Rush.onHit:
1[W] damage, and you mark each enemy adjacent to you until the end of your next turn.
Level 21: 2[W] damage.
Threatening Rush.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Bash and Pinion.name: Bash and Pinion
Bash and Pinion.flavor: You slam your weapon through your foe’s defenses, creating an opening. You then step in and trap your enemy.
Bash and Pinion.requirement: You must have a hand free.
Bash and Pinion.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you slide the target 1 square to a square adjacent to you. You grab the target, and until the grab ends, it takes a penalty to attack rolls equal to your Dexterity modifier. The grab ends automatically at the end of your next turn.

Hack and Hew.name: Hack and Hew
Hack and Hew.flavor: You hack an enemy with one stroke and then slash at another with your next swing.
Hack and Hew.secondaryTarget: One creature other than the primary target

Serpent's Coil.name: Serpent's Coil
Serpent's Coil.flavor: Like a striking snake, your weapon flashes and catches the limbs of your foe.
Serpent's Coil.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, the target takes a penalty to attack rolls equal to your Dexterity modifier.
Serpent's Coil.weapon: If you’re wielding a flail, you grab the target. The grab ends automatically at the end of your next turn.

Surprising Stab.name: Surprising Stab
Surprising Stab.flavor: You slash at your enemy’s head and bring in your off-hand weapon with a fast, deadly strike.
Surprising Stab.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Surprising Stab.onHit: Strength modifier damage, and the target grants combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn. Make a secondary attack against the target.

Takedown Attack.name: Takedown Attack
Takedown Attack.flavor: You bash your foe with a vicious attack and then drag the creature down to the ground.
Takedown Attack.requirement: You must have a hand free.
Takedown Attack.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you knock the target prone.
Takedown Attack.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Bristling Defense.name: Bristling Defense
Bristling Defense.flavor: You throw your arms wide and strike two foes, each with a different weapon.
Bristling Defense.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Bristling Defense.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, the primary target cannot gain combat advantage from flanking you.
Bristling Defense.secondaryTarget: One creature other than the primary target
Bristling Defense.secondaryOnHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. Until the end of your next turn, the secondary target cannot gain combat advantage from flanking you.

Driving Attack.name: Driving Attack
Driving Attack.flavor: You drive back your adversary with a hail of blows.
Driving Attack.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target 1 square. You then shift 1 square to a square the target vacated. Make a secondary attack against the target.
Driving Attack.secondaryOnHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target 2 squares and knock it prone.
Driving Attack.secondaryOnMiss: Half damage, and you push the target 1 square.

Press of Steel.name: Press of Steel
Press of Steel.flavor: You attack your foe and then use your shield to pin it in place.
Press of Steel.requirement: You must be using a shield.
Press of Steel.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and if the target is adjacent to you and to blocking terrain, it is restrained (save ends). The condition also ends if you are no longer adjacent to the target.
Press of Steel.onMiss: Half damage, and if the target is adjacent to you and to blocking terrain, it is immobilized until the end of your next turn.

Seize and Stab.name: Seize and Stab
Seize and Stab.flavor: You grab your foe to make certain of your aim. Then you plunge your weapon into the creature.
Seize and Stab.requirement: You must have a hand free.
Seize and Stab.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you grab the target. The target cannot attempt to escape the grab until the end of its next turn.

Unstoppable Advance.name: Unstoppable Advance
Unstoppable Advance.flavor:
You swing with such fury that your foes are steadily driven back
with each blow.
Unstoppable Advance.effect: Until the stance ends, whenever you hit any creature with a melee weapon attack, you push that creature 1 square and can shift 1 square to a square the creature vacated.

Forceful Drag.name: Forceful Drag
Forceful Drag.flavor: You dig your fingers into a foe and drag the struggling opponent across the battlefield.
Forceful Drag.requirement: You must have a creature grabbed.
Forceful Drag.effect: You move your speed. For each square you move, you slide a creature grabbed by you 1 square to a square adjacent to you. The creature remains grabbed, and you do not provoke an opportunity attack from the grabbed creature for this movement. At the end of the move, you can end the grab to knock the creature prone.

Full Extension.name: Full Extension
Full Extension.flavor: You lunge forward, hitting a spot well beyond where your foes thought you could reach.
Full Extension.effect: The reach of the next melee weapon attack you make before the end of your turn increases by 1.

Mighty Leap.name: Mighty Leap
Mighty Leap.flavor: You gather your strength for a truly impressive jump.
Mighty Leap.effect: Until the end of your turn, you gain a +5 power bonus to Athletics checks to jump. In addition, any jump you make is considered to have a running start, and you can make an Athletics check instead of an Acrobatics check to reduce falling damage.

Quick Escape.name: Quick Escape
Quick Escape.flavor: You quickly try to shake off whatever’s holding you.
Quick Escape.effect: You make an escape attempt, or you make a saving throw against an effect that immobilizes or restrains you and that a save can end.

Snagging Grip.name: Snagging Grip
Snagging Grip.flavor: When you’re knocked off balance, you grab hold of the enemy in front of you and bring it staggering along with you.
Snagging Grip.trigger: An enemy adjacent to you knocks you prone or forces you to move
Snagging Grip.target: The triggering enemy in the burst
Snagging Grip.effect: If the target forced you to move, you can pull it to a square adjacent to you. If the target knocked you prone, you knock it prone.

Bull Charge.name: Bull Charge
Bull Charge.flavor: You run into your enemy, taking a brutal swing. Your force knocks your enemy backward and to the ground, allowing you to step forward.
Bull Charge.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target 1 square. You then shift 1 square to a square the target vacated. Make a secondary attack against the target.
Bull Charge.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Reaver's Hook.name: Reaver's Hook
Reaver's Hook.flavor: Your mighty swing embeds your weapon in your foe.
Reaver's Hook.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. If the target moves before the end of your next turn, it takes extra damage equal to your Constitution modifier.
Reaver's Hook.weapon: If you’re wielding an axe or a pick, you can shift 1 square after the attack. You pull the target to the square you vacated.

Shield Edge Block.name: Shield Edge Block
Shield Edge Block.flavor: You block your foe’s attack with a quick slam of your shield’s edge, striking a powerful blow in the process.
Shield Edge Block.requirement: You must be using a shield.
Shield Edge Block.trigger: An enemy adjacent to you hits or misses you with a close or a melee attack
Shield Edge Block.effect: The target takes a –4 penalty to the attack roll.
Shield Edge Block.attack:
Strength + 2 vs. Fortitude
Level 11: Strength + 4 vs. Fortitude

Slamming Rush.name: Slamming Rush
Slamming Rush.flavor: You yank your grabbed foe across the battlefield. Upon reaching your destination, you slam it to the ground.
Slamming Rush.effect: You move your speed. For each square you move, you slide the target 1 square to a square adjacent to you. The creature remains grabbed, and you do not provoke an opportunity attack from the target during this movement.
Slamming Rush.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you knock the target prone. If the target is adjacent to blocking terrain, add your Dexterity modifier to the damage.

Sweeping Slash.name: Sweeping Slash
Sweeping Slash.flavor: You whirl your main weapon in an overhead cut that forces your foes to step back. You then follow up with your other weapon.
Sweeping Slash.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Sweeping Slash.primaryTarget: Each enemy in the burst you can see
Sweeping Slash.onHit: You push the primary target 1 square.
Sweeping Slash.effect: You shift 1 square and make a melee secondary attack.
Sweeping Slash.secondaryTarget: One creature targeted by the primary attack

Bare-Knuckled Rebuke.name: Bare-Knuckled Rebuke
Bare-Knuckled Rebuke.flavor: Your enemies leave themselves open to your powerful punches when they miss with their attacks.
Bare-Knuckled Rebuke.effect: Until the stance ends, you can use the Bare-Knuckled Rebuke Attack power.
Bare-Knuckled Rebuke.requirement: You must have a hand free.
Bare-Knuckled Rebuke.trigger: An enemy adjacent to you misses you with a melee attack
Bare-Knuckled Rebuke.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target grants combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn.

Crushing Foot.name: Crushing Foot
Crushing Foot.flavor: You grab your foe and smash it to the ground. You then place your foot on its neck to keep the creature down.
Crushing Foot.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. Until the end of the encounter, the target cannot move on its turn if it was grabbed by you at the start of its turn.

Dervish's Challenge.name: Dervish's Challenge
Dervish's Challenge.flavor: You hold your weapons close to your body, prepared to strike out when an enemy leaves you an opening.
Dervish's Challenge.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Dervish's Challenge.effect: Until the stance ends, whenever you are wielding two weapons and make a melee basic attack against a creature as an immediate action or an opportunity action, you can make a melee basic attack with your off-hand weapon against that creature as a free action.

Relentless Pressure.name: Relentless Pressure
Relentless Pressure.flavor: Jabbing and pushing with your shield, you force your foe into using rudimentary attacks.
Relentless Pressure.requirement: You must be using a shield.
Relentless Pressure.effect: The target can use only basic attacks to attack while you are adjacent to it (save ends).

Makeshift Shield.name: Makeshift Shield
Makeshift Shield.flavor: You snatch a piece of furniture, a body, or a discarded item to block an enemy’s attack.
Makeshift Shield.requirement: You must have a hand free.
Makeshift Shield.trigger: An enemy hits you with a close or a melee attack
Makeshift Shield.effect: You gain a a bonus to defenses against the attack equal to your Dexterity modifer.

Ready to Retaliate.name: Ready to Retaliate
Ready to Retaliate.flavor: You hold your weapon high overhead, ready to swing at any foe that attacks you.
Ready to Retaliate.effect: Until the stance ends, you can use a free action to mark any enemy that makes a melee attack against you. The mark lasts until the end of the enemy’s next turn.

Rejoin the Fray.name: Rejoin the Fray
Rejoin the Fray.flavor: Reinvigorated by an ally’s healing, you rush back into the fray.
Rejoin the Fray.trigger: An ally uses a healing power on you
Rejoin the Fray.effect: If you are prone, you stand up and shift 1 square. If you are standing, you instead shift 3 squares.

Unbalancing Dodge.name: Unbalancing Dodge
Unbalancing Dodge.flavor: You duck out of the way of your foe’s attack, putting the creature off balance.
Unbalancing Dodge.trigger: An enemy misses you with a melee attack
Unbalancing Dodge.effect: The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls and all defenses until the end of its next turn.

Bloody the Field.name: Bloody the Field
Bloody the Field.flavor: You raise your weapon high, recognizing that the time has come to finish off your foe.
Bloody the Field.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. If the target is bloodied, it is dazed until the end of your next turn.
Bloody the Field.weapon: If you’re wielding an axe, a hammer, or a mace, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

Bludgeoning Vise.name: Bludgeoning Vise
Bludgeoning Vise.flavor: Your weapon crunches down on your enemy’s skull. You then drive your fist into your foe’s face.
Bludgeoning Vise.requirement: You must have a hand free.
Bludgeoning Vise.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn. Make a secondary attack against the target.
Bludgeoning Vise.secondaryOnHit: 1[W] damage, and you knock the target prone.

Echoing Assault.name: Echoing Assault
Echoing Assault.flavor: You batter the foe with a mighty swing and prepare to catch it with the backswing if it doesn’t have the sense to move.
Echoing Assault.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. If the target is adjacent to you at the start of your next turn, as a free action you can make a melee basic attack against the target as the first action you take during your turn.
Echoing Assault.weapon: If you’re wielding an axe, a hammer, or a mace, the attacks deal extra damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

Hydra Charge.name: Hydra Charge
Hydra Charge.flavor: Your advance seems brash, but it’s actually a flurry of perfectly timed strikes that bewilder your foes.
Hydra Charge.target: Each enemy in the burst you can see
Hydra Charge.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target takes a –2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.
Hydra Charge.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Opportunist's Rend.name: Opportunist's Rend
Opportunist's Rend.flavor: You deliver a series of deadly blows to an enemy that lets its guard down.
Opportunist's Rend.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Opportunist's Rend.effect: Make a secondary attack against the target.
Opportunist's Rend.special: You can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Bone Crusher.name: Bone Crusher
Bone Crusher.flavor: Your crushing blow leaves your enemy susceptible to other attacks.
Bone Crusher.effect: The target gains vulnerable 10 to weapon attacks (save ends).

Hobbling Cut.name: Hobbling Cut
Hobbling Cut.flavor: You cripple your foe with painful wounds to its leg and its arm.
Hobbling Cut.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is slowed and weakened (save ends both).
Hobbling Cut.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is slowed and weakened until the end of your next turn.

One Against Many.name: One Against Many
One Against Many.flavor: When your enemies gang up on you, you have the advantage, for it means you have no shortage of targets.
One Against Many.target: Each enemy in the burst you can see
One Against Many.effect: Until the end of the encounter, you gain a +1 power bonus to all defenses while two or more enemies are adjacent to you. You also gain a +1 power bonus to weapon attack rolls while no allies are adjacent to you.

Staggering Blow.name: Staggering Blow
Staggering Blow.flavor: You batter your enemy with a powerful blow and send it stumbling away from you.
Staggering Blow.requirement: You must have a hand free.
Staggering Blow.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target 3 squares. The target is dazed (save ends).
Staggering Blow.onMiss: Half damage, and you push the target 1 square. The target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Unstoppable Assault.name: Unstoppable Assault
Unstoppable Assault.flavor: You fend off an enemy’s advance by striking hard and then jabbing the foe with the edge of your shield.
Unstoppable Assault.trigger: An enemy moves during its turn to a square adjacent to you
Unstoppable Assault.requirement: You must be using a shield.
Unstoppable Assault.effect: Until the end of your next turn, the target cannot grab you, restrain you, or enter your space.
Unstoppable Assault.sustainMinor: Choose one enemy adjacent to you. That creature cannot grab you, restrain you, or enter your space until the end of your next turn.

Fighter's Grit.name: Fighter's Grit
Fighter's Grit.flavor: With pure determination, you ignore weakness and battle on.
Fighter's Grit.effect: Until the end of your next turn, you ignore the effects of the dazed, immobilized, slowed, and weakened conditions.

Body Shield (Fighter).name: Body Shield (Fighter)
Body Shield (Fighter).flavor: You yank a foe into the path of an enemy’s attack.
Body Shield (Fighter).trigger: An enemy hits you with a melee or a ranged attack
Body Shield (Fighter).requirement: You must have a hand free.
Body Shield (Fighter).target: One creature other than the triggering enemy
Body Shield (Fighter).effect: Make a grab attack against the target. If you grab the target, the triggering enemy’s attack deals half damage to you and half damage to the target.

Fist of Lightning.name: Fist of Lightning
Fist of Lightning.flavor: You clench your fist and prepare a rapid assault.
Fist of Lightning.effect: Until the stance ends, your unarmed attacks deal extra damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.

Grappler's Stance.name: Grappler's Stance
Grappler's Stance.flavor: You wrench the limbs of your enemy, weakening its resolve.
Grappler's Stance.effect: Until the stance ends, any creature grabbed by you is restrained until the grab ends.

Steely Persuasion.name: Steely Persuasion
Steely Persuasion.flavor: Your skill with the blade is enough to daunt even stalwart foes.
Steely Persuasion.trigger: You make an Intimidate check or a Streetwise check
Steely Persuasion.requirement: You must be wielding a melee weapon.
Steely Persuasion.effect: You gain a bonus to the skill check equal to the weapon’s proficiency bonus plus the weapon’s enhancement bonus.

Bash and Pummel.name: Bash and Pummel
Bash and Pummel.flavor: You hack down one enemy and then slash at another nearby with your next blow.
Bash and Pummel.attack: Strength vs. AC. You make the attack twice, distributing the attacks between the targets or making both attacks against one.
Bash and Pummel.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn. If you hit the same target twice with this power, the second attack deals extra damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.

Battle Jump.name: Battle Jump
Battle Jump.flavor: You leap past your foe in a great bound, stabbing above its guard as you go.
Battle Jump.effect: Before or after the attack, you jump 2 squares. You do not provoke opportunity attacks during the jump.

Hilt Smash.name: Hilt Smash
Hilt Smash.flavor: After a wide swing, you reverse your weapon and slam its grip against your foe’s head.
Hilt Smash.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Hilt Smash.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target grants combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn.
Hilt Smash.effect: Make a secondary attack against the target.
Hilt Smash.secondaryOnHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn if you have combat advantage against it.

Stranglehold.name: Stranglehold
Stranglehold.flavor: While your foe is still reeling from your hit, you wrap your arm around its neck and squeeze.
Stranglehold.requirement: You must have a hand free.
Stranglehold.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you grab the target. The target is dazed until the grab ends. The grab ends automatically at the end of your next turn.
Stranglehold.special: When making an opportunity attack, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Eye Gouge.name: Eye Gouge
Eye Gouge.flavor: You deliver a quick strike to your foe and then go for its eyes, attempting to gouge them out with your free hand.
Eye Gouge.requirement: You must have a hand free.
Eye Gouge.effect: Make a secondary attack against the target.
Eye Gouge.secondaryOnHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is blinded (save ends).
Eye Gouge.secondaryOnMiss: Half damage, and the target is blinded until the end of your next turn.

No Room to Breathe.name: No Room to Breathe
No Room to Breathe.flavor: You press the attack with relentless intensity, leaving your foe no time to launch a proper counterattack.
No Room to Breathe.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is weakened until the end of your next turn.
No Room to Breathe.onMiss: The target is weakened until the end of your next turn.

Relentless Headlock.name: Relentless Headlock
Relentless Headlock.flavor: After a preparatory strike with you weapon, you wrap your arm around your foe, leaving no room to escape.
Relentless Headlock.requirement: You must have a hand free.
Relentless Headlock.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you grab the target. Until the grab ends, the target grants combat advantage to you. Whenever the target fails to escape the grab, you can make an opportunity attack against it.
Relentless Headlock.onMiss: Half damage, and you grab the target.

Sudden Opportunity.name: Sudden Opportunity
Sudden Opportunity.flavor: When one of your allies hits an enemy, you take advantage of the foe’s distraction to put it on the ground with a quick attack.
Sudden Opportunity.trigger: An enemy within 2 squares of you is bloodied by your or your ally’s attack or suffers a critical hit from you or your ally
Sudden Opportunity.effect: Before the attack, you shift 3 squares.
Sudden Opportunity.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is dazed (save ends).
Sudden Opportunity.weapon: If you’re wielding an axe, a hammer, a mace, or a pick, you knock the target prone.

Battle Acumen.name: Battle Acumen
Battle Acumen.flavor: You absorb everything going on around you, and your enemies find it hard to catch you unaware.
Battle Acumen.effect: Until the stance ends, you don’t grant combat advantage while you are conscious.

Fury's Resurgence.name: Fury's Resurgence
Fury's Resurgence.flavor: The thrill of the kill is enough to shake off any ill effects.
Fury's Resurgence.trigger: You score a critical hit or reduce an enemy to 0 hit points
Fury's Resurgence.effect: You spend a healing surge and regain additional hit points equal to your Constitution modifier. You make a saving throw against each effect on you that a save can end, and you gain a bonus to the saving throws equal to your Constitution modifier.

Painful Drag.name: Painful Drag
Painful Drag.flavor: You stride across the room, dragging an enemy behind you.
Painful Drag.requirement: You must have a creature grabbed.
Painful Drag.effect: You move your speed. For each square you move, you slide a creature grabbed by you 1 square to a square adjacent to you. The creature remains grabbed, and you do not provoke an opportunity attack from the grabbed creature for this movement. The grabbed creature grants combat advantage until the end of your next turn.

Tangle Up.name: Tangle Up
Tangle Up.flavor: When your enemy lowers its guard, you take the opportunity to tangle its feet and send it sprawling.
Tangle Up.trigger: You hit or miss an enemy with an opportunity attack
Tangle Up.effect: You knock the target prone. You mark the target (save ends).

Twisting Escape.name: Twisting Escape
Twisting Escape.flavor: You twist your body like a contortionist, escaping even the tightest restraints.
Twisting Escape.prerequisite: You must be trained in Athletics.
Twisting Escape.effect: You attempt to escape a grab and gain a +5 bonus to the Athletics check to escape. If you escape, you can shift half your speed instead of the normal 1 square.

Lunging Dervish.name: Lunging Dervish
Lunging Dervish.flavor: You take a long step forward, bending low as your leading arm delivers an arcing slash. You follow the attack with a quick cut from your off-hand weapon.
Lunging Dervish.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Lunging Dervish.primaryTarget: Each enemy in the burst you can see
Lunging Dervish.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you slide the primary target 1 square.
Lunging Dervish.effect: Make a secondary attack that is a close burst 1.
Lunging Dervish.secondaryTarget: Each enemy in the burst you can see

Minotaur Charge.name: Minotaur Charge
Minotaur Charge.flavor: You lower your head and charge your foe, sending it sprawling.
Minotaur Charge.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target 1 square and shift 1 square to a square the target vacated. Make a secondary attack against the target.
Minotaur Charge.secondaryOnHit: You push the target 3 squares and knock it prone.
Minotaur Charge.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Punishing Shield Block.name: Punishing Shield Block
Punishing Shield Block.flavor: You catch your enemy’s attack with your shield and then slam the shield back into your foe, knocking it down.
Punishing Shield Block.requirement: You must be using a shield.
Punishing Shield Block.trigger: An enemy adjacent to you hits or misses you with a close or a melee attack
Punishing Shield Block.effect: The target takes a –2 penalty to the attack roll.
Punishing Shield Block.attack:
Strength + 4 vs. Fortitude
Level 21: Strength + 6 vs. Fortitude
Punishing Shield Block.onHit: 2d6 + Strength modifier damage, and you knock the target prone.

Vicious Uppercut.name: Vicious Uppercut
Vicious Uppercut.flavor: You make a diversionary attack with your weapon to hide the real threat—an uppercut from your free hand.
Vicious Uppercut.requirement: You must have a hand free.
Vicious Uppercut.effect: Make a secondary attack against the target.
Vicious Uppercut.secondaryOnHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is stunned until the end of your next turn.

Battlefield Challenge.name: Battlefield Challenge
Battlefield Challenge.flavor: Roaring a war cry, you rush an enemy and prove that it is you that it should be attacking.
Battlefield Challenge.effect: Until the end of the encounter, whenever an enemy you can see makes an attack that does not include you as a target, you can mark that enemy as an opportunity action. The mark takes effect after the attack, and it lasts until the end of your next turn.
Battlefield Challenge.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Iron Tornado.name: Iron Tornado
Iron Tornado.flavor: You sweep your weapon through nearby enemies. Then, while they’re recovering, you seize a foe and hurl it away from you.
Iron Tornado.requirement: You must have a hand free.
Iron Tornado.primaryTarget: Each enemy in the burst you can see
Iron Tornado.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the primary target is dazed until the end of your next turn. Make a melee secondary attack.
Iron Tornado.secondaryTarget: One creature hit by the primary attack
Iron Tornado.secondaryOnHit: You push the secondary target a number of squares equal to 1 + your Dexterity modifier and knock it prone.

Mighty Shield Slam.name: Mighty Shield Slam
Mighty Shield Slam.flavor: You slam your shield into your foe with a quick, powerful thrust.
Mighty Shield Slam.requirement: You must be using a shield.
Mighty Shield Slam.attack:
Strength + 4 vs. Fortitude
Level 21: Strength + 6 vs. Fortitude
Mighty Shield Slam.onHit: 2d6 + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target 1 square. The target is dazed until the end of your next turn.

Persistence of Blades.name: Persistence of Blades
Persistence of Blades.flavor: You are a whirl of steel and resolve. Nothing can deter you from striking your foe.
Persistence of Blades.effect: Until the stance ends, once per turn when you miss with a melee attack roll, you can reroll the attack roll.

Pugilist's Resolve.name: Pugilist's Resolve
Pugilist's Resolve.flavor: Your enemies leave themselves open to your powerful punches when they attack you but fail to hit.
Pugilist's Resolve.requirement: You must have a hand free.
Pugilist's Resolve.effect: Until the stance ends, you can use the power Pugilist's Resolve Attack.
Pugilist's Resolve.trigger: An enemy adjacent to you misses you with a melee attack
Pugilist's Resolve.onHit: Strength modifier + Dexterity modifier damage, and you knock the target prone.

Instant Getaway.name: Instant Getaway
Instant Getaway.flavor: You quickly try to shake off whatever’s holding you.
Instant Getaway.effect: You can make an escape attempt, or you can make a saving throw against an effect that immobilizes or restrains you and that a save can end.

Prescient Shield.name: Prescient Shield
Prescient Shield.flavor: You appear to raise your shield to block your foes’ attacks even before the creatures swing.
Prescient Shield.requirement: You must be using a shield
Prescient Shield.effect: Until the stance ends, whenever an enemy adjacent to you hits you, you can gain a bonus to AC and Reflex against the attack equal to your Wisdom modifier as an immediate interrupt.

Surprising Finish.name: Surprising Finish
Surprising Finish.flavor: As you release your grip on a foe, you smash your hand into its face, sending the creature reeling.
Surprising Finish.effect: You knock the target prone, and the target is dazed (save ends).

Undeniable Challenge.name: Undeniable Challenge
Undeniable Challenge.flavor: You call a creature out, and it has no choice except to focus its attention on you.
Undeniable Challenge.target: One or two creatures marked by you
Undeniable Challenge.effect: Until the end of your next turn, the target cannot make any attack that does not include you as a target.

Behemoth Wrath.name: Behemoth Wrath
Behemoth Wrath.flavor: You rush your foe and drive the creature to its knees with a powerful blow.
Behemoth Wrath.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
Behemoth Wrath.weapon: If you’re wielding an axe, a hammer, or a mace, the attack deals extra damage equal to your Constitution modifier, and you knock the target prone.
Behemoth Wrath.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Colossal Strike.name: Colossal Strike
Colossal Strike.flavor: You deal a mighty blow that sends your enemy staggering.
Colossal Strike.onHit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target a number of squares equal to your Constitution modifier.
Colossal Strike.weapon: If you’re wielding an axe, a hammer, or a mace, you also knock the target prone.

Gut Punch.name: Gut Punch
Gut Punch.flavor: Your weapon is busy parrying the enemy’s attacks, so you smash your fist into its vitals.
Gut Punch.requirement: You must have a hand free.
Gut Punch.trigger: An enemy misses you with a melee attack
Gut Punch.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is immobilized and weakened until the end of its next turn.

Opportunist's Trap.name: Opportunist's Trap
Opportunist's Trap.flavor: Your first foray against the enemy is ruse, ripening the foe for subsequent attacks.
Opportunist's Trap.requirement: The power Opportunist's Trap must be active in order to use this power.
Opportunist's Trap.effect: Make a secondary attack against the target.
Opportunist's Trap.secondaryOnHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you knock the target prone.
Opportunist's Trap.secondaryeffect: Before your attack, you shift your speed.
Opportunist's Trap.trigger: The target makes an attack roll

Trollclaw Grip.name: Trollclaw Grip
Trollclaw Grip.flavor: You follow a hard cut from your weapon with an attempt to seize a nearby enemy in a debilitating grip.
Trollclaw Grip.requirement: You must have a hand free.
Trollclaw Grip.effect: Make a secondary attack against the target.
Trollclaw Grip.secondaryOnHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you grab the target. The target grants combat advantage until the grab ends.

Blinding Provocation.name: Blinding Provocation
Blinding Provocation.flavor: You open a bleeding cut that obscures your enemy’s vision. You then goad your sightless foe into attacking blindly.
Blinding Provocation.onHit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is blinded (save ends). Until the target is no longer blinded, whenever it misses with a melee attack, you can slide the target 1 square as an opportunity action, and the target then makes a melee basic attack against one creature of your choice as a free action.
Blinding Provocation.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is blinded until the end of your next turn.

Deft Counterattack.name: Deft Counterattack
Deft Counterattack.flavor: You intercept the foe’s weapon with such force that it becomes stuck in your shield. You then deliver a stinging counterattack.
Deft Counterattack.requirement: You must be using a shield.
Deft Counterattack.trigger: An enemy misses you with a melee attack
Deft Counterattack.onHit: 5[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target drops one weapon it is wielding. You can choose to catch the dropped weapon in a free hand or have it land on the ground at your feet (in your square). The target grants combat advantage to you (save ends).

Hammering Pommel.name: Hammering Pommel
Hammering Pommel.flavor: You strike with your weapon and then use the weapon’s pommel to knock your opponent backward, rattling its senses.
Hammering Pommel.requirement: You must have a hand free.
Hammering Pommel.onHit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target 3 squares. The target is stunned (save ends).
Hammering Pommel.onMiss: Half damage, and you push the target 1 square. The target is stunned until the end of your next turn.

Hold at Bay.name: Hold at Bay
Hold at Bay.flavor: You hack at your foe and then seize hold of it, preventing the creature from attacking effectively.
Hold at Bay.requirement: You must have a hand free.
Hold at Bay.onHit: 5[W] + Strength modifier damage. Make an unarmed secondary attack against the target.
Hold at Bay.secondaryOnHit: You grab the target. In addition to the normal effects of a grab, the target is restrained until the grab ends.

Impaling Knockdown.name: Impaling Knockdown
Impaling Knockdown.flavor: You knock your foe to the ground and drive your weapon into its gut.
Impaling Knockdown.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Impaling Knockdown.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you knock the target prone. Make a secondary attack against the target.
Impaling Knockdown.secondaryOnHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and ongoing 15 damage (save ends).

Blinding Cut.name: Blinding Cut
Blinding Cut.flavor: Your first attack causes your foe to double over in pain, allowing you to attack its eyes.
Blinding Cut.requirement: You must be wielding two melee weapons.
Blinding Cut.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target grants combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn.
Blinding Cut.effect: Make a secondary attack against the target.
Blinding Cut.secondaryOnHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage. If you have combat advantage against the target, it is blinded until the end of your next turn.

Gash and Goad.name: Gash and Goad
Gash and Goad.flavor: A powerful blow attracts your foe’s attention. When you move off and taunt the creature, it chases you.
Gash and Goad.effect: After the attack, you shift 3 squares. If you hit the target, you pull it adjacent to you.

Invigorating Fury.name: Invigorating Fury
Invigorating Fury.flavor: With a roar, you let out a flurry of attacks that invigorates you.
Invigorating Fury.target: Each enemy in the burst you can see

Wrenching Assault.name: Wrenching Assault
Wrenching Assault.flavor: Your weapon strikes your enemy and sends it spinning, leaving you free to move in and grapple.
Wrenching Assault.requirement: You must have a hand free.
Wrenching Assault.onHit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you slide the target 1 square to a square adjacent to you. You grab the target, and the target drops one weapon it is wielding. You can choose to catch the weapon in a free hand or have it land on the ground at your feet (in your square). If the target is not wielding a weapon, it instead grants combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn. The grab ends automatically at the end of your next turn.

Debilitating Bash.name: Debilitating Bash
Debilitating Bash.flavor: You deliver a series of shield bashes that keeps your enemy on the defensive and prevents it from unleashing any skilled attacks.
Debilitating Bash.requirement: You must be using a shield.
Debilitating Bash.onHit: 6d6 + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target a number of squares equal to your Strength modifier. The target can use only basic attacks to attack (save ends).
Debilitating Bash.onMiss: Half damage, and the target can use only basic attacks to attack until the end of your next turn.

Exhilarating Assault.name: Exhilarating Assault
Exhilarating Assault.flavor: You rush at the enemy, feeling a fierce exhilaration that allows you to ignore your wounds.
Exhilarating Assault.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you can spend a healing surge.
Exhilarating Assault.effect: You can make a saving throw against each effect on you that a save can end. Until the end of the encounter, you have regeneration 15 while you are bloodied.
Exhilarating Assault.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Neck Snap.name: Neck Snap
Neck Snap.flavor: After a wicked slash from your weapon, you seize your foe’s throat and try to snap its neck.
Neck Snap.requirement: You must have a hand free.
Neck Snap.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you grab the target. The target is restrained until the grab ends. You can make the following secondary attack against the target as a standard action or as an immediate interrupt when the target attempts to escape the grab.
Neck Snap.secondaryOnHit: 6[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the grab ends.
Neck Snap.secondaryOnMiss: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the grab ends.

Savage Butchery.name: Savage Butchery
Savage Butchery.flavor: You hack your enemies to pieces with a savage series of brutal cuts.
Savage Butchery.weapon: If you’re wielding an axe, a hammer, or a mace, the attack deals 1[W] extra damage against prone targets.

Sudden Onslaught.name: Sudden Onslaught
Sudden Onslaught.flavor: When your ally lands a telling blow, you sense opportunity. You quickly leap in to finish off the foe.
Sudden Onslaught.trigger: An enemy within 2 squares of you is bloodied by your or your ally’s attack or suffers a critical hit from you or your ally
Sudden Onslaught.effect: You shift your speed to a square adjacent to the triggering enemy.
Sudden Onslaught.onHit: 5[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is dazed and weakened (save ends both).
Sudden Onslaught.weapon: If you’re wielding an axe, a hammer, a mace, or a pick, you also knock the target prone.
Sudden Onslaught.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is dazed and weakened until the end of your next turn.

Shifting Blade.name: Shifting Blade
Shifting Blade.flavor: You switch your weapon to your empty hand, catching your enemy completely off guard.
Shifting Blade.requirement: You must have a hand free.
Shifting Blade.effect: The target grants combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn.

Shield Feint.name: Shield Feint
Shield Feint.flavor: With subtle movements and misdirection, you use your shield to keep your opponent unsure about your next attack.
Shield Feint.requirement: You must be using a shield.
Shield Feint.onHit:
1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you gain a +3 power bonus to your next attack roll against the target before the end of your next turn.
Level 21: 2[W] + Strength modifier.

Shield Riposte.name: Shield Riposte
Shield Riposte.flavor: Sweeping an attack aside, you strike with your shield while your foe is out of position.
Shield Riposte.requirement: You must be using a shield.
Shield Riposte.trigger: An enemy adjacent to you hits or misses you or an ally with a melee attack
Shield Riposte.attack:
Strength + 3 vs. Fortitude
Level 11: Strength + 6 vs. Fortitude
Level 21: Strength + 9 vs. Fortitude
Shield Riposte.onHit: 1d10 + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target 1 square. You then shift 2 squares to a square adjacent to the target.

Shove and Slap.name: Shove and Slap
Shove and Slap.flavor: As you push away the foe in front of you, you greet another with the cold surface of your shield.
Shove and Slap.requirement: You must be using a shield.
Shove and Slap.attack:
Strength + 3 vs. Fortitude
Level 11: Strength + 6 vs. Fortitude
Level 21: Strength + 9 vs. Fortitude
Shove and Slap.onHit: 2d10 + Strength modifier damage, and you push the primary target a number of squares equal to 1 + your Wisdom modifier. You can shift 1 square into the space your target occupied.
Shove and Slap.onMiss: Half damage, and you push the primary target 1 square.
Shove and Slap.secondaryTarget: One creature other than the primary target
Shove and Slap.secondaryAttack:
Strength + 3 vs. Fortitude
Level 11: Strength + 6 vs. Fortitude
Level 21: Strength + 9 vs. Fortitude
Shove and Slap.secondaryOnHit: Strength modifier damage, and the secondary target is dazed (save ends).

Shielding Shove.name: Shielding Shove
Shielding Shove.flavor: You shove an ally out of harm’s way with your shield.
Shielding Shove.requirement: You must be using a shield.
Shielding Shove.effect: You push the target 3 squares. Then you can mark an enemy adjacent to you until the end of your next turn.

Immediate Vengeance.name: Immediate Vengeance
Immediate Vengeance.flavor: An attack gets through, but before the attacker can withdraw, you smash your shield down upon it with crippling force.
Immediate Vengeance.requirement: You must be using a shield.
Immediate Vengeance.trigger: An enemy adjacent to you hits you or an ally with a melee attack
Immediate Vengeance.attack:
Strength + 3 vs. Fortitude
Level 11: Strength + 6 vs. Fortitude
Level 21: Strength + 9 vs. Fortitude
Immediate Vengeance.onHit: 1d10 damage, and the target is weakened until the end of your next turn.

Unexpected Shield Bash.name: Unexpected Shield Bash
Unexpected Shield Bash.flavor: As your opponents guard against the relentless fury of your weapon, you surprise them with a shield attack that shows them you mean business.
Unexpected Shield Bash.requirement: You must be using a shield.
Unexpected Shield Bash.attack:
Strength + 4 vs. AC
Level 11: Strength + 6 vs. AC
Level 21: Strength + 9 vs. AC
Unexpected Shield Bash.effect: You mark each enemy within 5 squares of you who can see you until the end of your next turn.

Intimidating Reminder.name: Intimidating Reminder
Intimidating Reminder.flavor: Just the sight of your shield keeps the memory of its use fresh in the minds of your enemies.
Intimidating Reminder.requirement: You must be using a shield.
Intimidating Reminder.effect: Until the stance ends, enemies take a -2 penalty to Fortitude while adjacent to you.

Armored Assault.name: Armored Assault
Armored Assault.flavor: Burying your shoulder into your shield, you plow forward through any foe.
Armored Assault.requirement: You must be using a shield.
Armored Assault.effect: You move your speed. At one point during this movement, you can make the following attack.
Armored Assault.attack:
Strength + 4 vs. Fortitude
Level 11: Strength + 6 vs. Fortitude
Level 21: Strength + 9 vs. Fortitude
Armored Assault.onHit: 1d10 + Strength modifier damage, and you slide the target 1 square and knock it prone.

Shield and a Hard Place.name: Shield and a Hard Place
Shield and a Hard Place.flavor: Having maneuvered your foe into a disadvantageous position, you lunge and trap it with your shield.
Shield and a Hard Place.requirement: You must be using a shield.
Shield and a Hard Place.target: One creature that is prone, adjacent to blocking terrain, or adjacent to an ally
Shield and a Hard Place.attack:
Strength + 6 vs. Fortitude
Level 21: Strength + 9 vs. Fortitude
Shield and a Hard Place.onHit: 2d10 + Strength modifier damage, and the target is grabbed. Until the grab ends, when the target starts its turn, it takes damage equal to your Strength modifier.
Shield and a Hard Place.onMiss: Half damage, and you slide the target 1 square.
Shield and a Hard Place.special: When charging, you can use this power in place of a melee basic attack.

Shield Deflection.name: Shield Deflection
Shield Deflection.flavor: Attacks rebound from your shield to find new targets.
Shield Deflection.trigger: An attack against your AC or Reflex misses you
Shield Deflection.effect: Choose a creature within 2 squares of you and within range of the triggering attack, including the triggering attacker. The attacker repeats the attack against that creature.

Shield Bearer's Vendetta.name: Shield Bearer's Vendetta
Shield Bearer's Vendetta.flavor: When an enemy successfully attacks, you and your shield punish the foe—and any other enemies nearby.
Shield Bearer's Vendetta.requirement: You must be using a shield.
Shield Bearer's Vendetta.trigger: An enemy hits you or an ally adjacent to you with a melee attack
Shield Bearer's Vendetta.effect: You can shift 2 squares to a square adjacent to the triggering enemy.
Shield Bearer's Vendetta.target: Each enemy in the burst you can see
Shield Bearer's Vendetta.attack:
Strength + 6 vs. Reflex
Level 21: Strength + 9 vs. Reflex
Shield Bearer's Vendetta.onHit: 1d10 + Strength modifier damage, and the target is dazed until the end of its next turn.

Unstoppable Force.name: Unstoppable Force
Unstoppable Force.flavor: While you are safely behind your shield, nothing can stand in your way.
Unstoppable Force.requirement: You must be using a shield.
Unstoppable Force.effect: You move your speed. Each time you enter a square adjacent to an enemy, make the following attack against that enemy. You cannot attack the same enemy more than once with this power.
Unstoppable Force.attack:
Strength + 7 vs. Fortitude
Level 21: Strength + 9 vs. Fortitude
Unstoppable Force.onHit: 2d10 + Strength modifier damage, and you slide the target 1 square and knock it prone.

Shield Clamor.name: Shield Clamor
Shield Clamor.flavor: The clanging of your weapon against your shield is a rallying cry for your allies.
Shield Clamor.requirement: You must be using a shield.
Shield Clamor.target: Each enemy in the burst you can see
Shield Clamor.effect: You mark the target until the end of your next turn. In addition, when the target makes an attack that does not include you as a target before the end of your next turn, you can charge the target as an immediate interrupt. If you hit the target with the attack at the end of the charge, the target also falls prone.

Defender Aura.name: Defender Aura
Defender Aura.sourceRef: Heroes of the Fallen Lands, Heroes of the Forgotten Kingdoms, Dragon Magazine 402, Heroes of the Feywild
Defender Aura.flavor: You work to occupy nearby foes using a combination of fighting skill and clever tactics to keep them distracted.
Defender Aura.effect: You activate an aura 1 that lasts until you end it as a minor action or until you fall unconscious. While in the aura, any enemy takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls when it makes an attack that does not include among its targets either you or an ally of yours who has this aura active. Marked enemies are not subject to this aura.

Battle Guardian.name: Battle Guardian
Battle Guardian.flavor: Ignoring you in battle leaves a foe open to a devastating assault.
Battle Guardian.trigger: An enemy subject to your defender aura either shifts or makes an attack that targets an ally of yours but not you or an ally who has an active defender aura.
Battle Guardian.effect: You make a melee basic attack against the triggering enemy. If the attack misses, the enemy still takes damage equal to your Strength modifier.

Battle Wrath.name: Battle Wrath
Battle Wrath.flavor: You channel your anger into each strike, dealing devastating damage to your foes.
Battle Wrath.effect:
You assume the battle wrath stance. Until the stance ends, you gain a +2 power bonus to the damage rolls of basic attacks using a weapon.
Level 11: +3 power bonus.
Level 21: +4 power bonus.

Cleaving Assault.name: Cleaving Assault
Cleaving Assault.flavor: Your wide, sweeping attacks carry through to let you lash out at another nearby foe.
Cleaving Assault.effect: You assume the cleaving assault stance. Until the stance ends, whenever you hit with a melee basic attack using a weapon, one enemy adjacent to you other than the target of that attack takes damage equal to your Constitution modifier.

Defend the Line.name: Defend the Line
Defend the Line.flavor: Your attack staggers a foe, hindering its attempts to flee from you.
Defend the Line.effect: You assume the defend the line stance. Until the stance ends, whenever you hit an enemy with a melee basic attack using a weapon, that enemy is slowed until the end of your next turn.

Hammer Hands.name: Hammer Hands
Hammer Hands.flavor: You throw your weight into each attack, striking with such force that you drive your enemy before you.
Hammer Hands.effect: You assume the hammer hands stance. Until the stance ends, whenever you hit an enemy with a melee basic attack using a weapon, you can use a free action to push that enemy 1 square and then shift the same distance to a square adjacent to the enemy.

Measured Cut.name: Measured Cut
Measured Cut.flavor: Each carefully timed strike lets you slip through your foes without fear of reprisal.
Measured Cut.effect: You assume the measured cut stance. Until the stance ends, whenever you hit an enemy with a melee basic attack using a weapon, you can shift 1 square as a free action.

Poised Assault.name: Poised Assault
Poised Assault.flavor: You settle into an offensive stance, your poise and focus making every strike count.
Poised Assault.effect: You assume the poised assault stance. Until the stance ends, you gain a +1 power bonus to the attack rolls of basic attacks using a weapon.

Power Strike.name: Power Strike
Power Strike.sourceRef: Heroes of the Fallen Lands, Heroes of the Forgotten Kingdoms
Power Strike.flavor: By pushing yourself beyond your normal limits, you unleash your full wrath against a foe.
Power Strike.trigger: You hit an enemy with a melee basic attack using a weapon.
Power Strike.effect:
The target takes 1[W] extra damage from the triggering attack.
Level 17: 2[W] extra damage.
Level 27: 3[W] extra damage.

Battle Leader.name: Battle Leader
Battle Leader.flavor: Your leadership experience lets you enable nearby allies to move safely through combat.
Battle Leader.prerequisite: You must have training in Diplomacy.
Battle Leader.effect: Each target can shift 1 square as a free action.

Glowering Threat.name: Glowering Threat
Glowering Threat.flavor: Your intimidating presence distracts your enemies as they attempt to attack your allies.
Glowering Threat.prerequisite: You must have training in Intimidate.
Glowering Threat.effect: Until the end of your next turn, each target takes a -5 penalty to attack rolls against any creature other than you.

Minor Resurgence.name: Minor Resurgence
Minor Resurgence.flavor: Your ability to withstand hardship grants you a temporary boost in combat.
Minor Resurgence.prerequisite: You must have training in Endurance.
Minor Resurgence.effect:
You gain 5 temporary hit points.
Level 11: 10 temporary hit points.
Level 21: 15 temporary hit points.

Push Forward.name: Push Forward
Push Forward.flavor: Through careful timing and balanced footwork, you avoid your enemies’ attacks as you advance.
Push Forward.prerequisite: You must have training in Athletics.
Push Forward.effect: You shift up to 3 squares to a square adjacent to an enemy.

Knight's Challenge.name: Knight's Challenge
Knight's Challenge.flavor: You point your weapon at your enemy. Its allies look at it expectantly, as it wavers between accepting your challenge and losing face before its friends.
Knight's Challenge.prerequisite: You must have training in Intimidate.
Knight's Challenge.target: One enemy in the burst whose Will is equal to or lower than 12 + your level
Knight's Challenge.effect: You pull the target up to 2 squares. You cannot pull the target into hindering terrain.

Dauntless Endurance.name: Dauntless Endurance
Dauntless Endurance.flavor: You easily shake off a debilitating effect that would cripple another warrior.
Dauntless Endurance.prerequisite: You must have training in Endurance.
Dauntless Endurance.trigger: You make a saving throw and dislike the result.
Dauntless Endurance.effect: You can reroll the saving throw but must use the second result.

Helping Hands.name: Helping Hands
Helping Hands.flavor: Your stalwart presence helps fortify an ally you reach out to.
Helping Hands.prerequisite: You must have training in Heal.
Helping Hands.effect: The target makes a saving throw.

Rapid Advance.name: Rapid Advance
Rapid Advance.flavor: Your physical training lets you surge quickly across the battlefield.
Rapid Advance.prerequisite: You must have training in Athletics.
Rapid Advance.effect: You move a number of squares up to your speed + your Constitution modifier.

Shield Block.name: Shield Block
Shield Block.flavor: You lunge with your shield to protect an ally from an attack.
Shield Block.requirement: You must use this power with a shield.
Shield Block.trigger: An attack hits or misses you or an ally adjacent to you and deals damage
Shield Block.target: The character hit or missed by the triggering attack
Shield Block.effect:
The damage dealt to the target is reduced by 1d10 + your Constitution modifier.
Level 11: 2d10 + Constitution modifier.
Level 21: 3d10 + Constitution modifier.

Battlefield Healing.name: Battlefield Healing
Battlefield Healing.flavor: Your attention enables a comrade to draw on his or her own reserves of healing.
Battlefield Healing.prerequisite: You must have training in Heal.
Battlefield Healing.effect: The target can spend a healing surge.

Defensive Advance.name: Defensive Advance
Defensive Advance.flavor: As you advance toward a chosen foe, you confound all attempts to attack you.
Defensive Advance.prerequisite: You must have training in Athletics.
Defensive Advance.effect: You gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses until the end of your next turn, and you shift up to your speed to a square adjacent to an enemy.

Iron Defiance.name: Iron Defiance
Iron Defiance.flavor: You draw on your inner strength to resist even the deadliest effects.
Iron Defiance.prerequisite: You must have training in Endurance.
Iron Defiance.effect: You take only half of the triggering damage.

Fearsome Threat.name: Fearsome Threat
Fearsome Threat.flavor: The threat you pose is enough to set your enemies on edge, giving you and your allies a temporary advantage.
Fearsome Threat.prerequisite: You must have training in Intimidate.
Fearsome Threat.effect: Each target grants combat advantage until it hits or misses you or until the end of your next turn.

Knight's Valor.name: Knight's Valor
Knight's Valor.flavor: With a moment’s focus, you renew your vigor before unleashing a powerful assault against your foes.
