Knight's Valor.effect: You can spend a healing surge. In addition, you gain a +2 power bonus to attack rolls and saving throws. The bonus lasts until the end of your next turn.

Berserker's Charge.name: Berserker's Charge
Berserker's Charge.flavor: You channel your combat fury to run down your foes.
Berserker's Charge.effect: You assume the berserker's charge stance. Until the stance ends, you gain a +2 power bonus to your speed when charging and a +2 power bonus to the attack rolls of your charge attacks.

Duelist's Assault.name: Duelist's Assault
Duelist's Assault.flavor: You focus your attention on a lone enemy, tearing into it with deadly force.
Duelist's Assault.effect:
You assume the duelist’s assault stance. Until the stance ends, you gain a +4 power bonus to melee weapon damage rolls with basic attacks against a target that has no creatures adjacent to it other than you.
Level 11: +6 power bonus.
Level 21: +8 power bonus.

Mobile Blade.name: Mobile Blade
Mobile Blade.flavor: The force of your weapon attack lets you spring away from your foe.
Mobile Blade.effect: You assume the mobile blade stance. Until the stance ends, whenever you hit an enemy with a basic attack using a weapon, you can move a number of squares up to your Dexterity modifier as a free action.

Unfettered Fury.name: Unfettered Fury
Unfettered Fury.flavor: You embrace your inner fury, hitting fast and hard to mow through your foes.
Unfettered Fury.effect:
You assume the unfettered fury stance. Until the stance ends, you take a -2 penalty to attack rolls with weapon powers and gain a +4 power bonus to the damage rolls of basic attacks using a weapon.
Level 11: +6 power bonus.
Level 21: +8 power bonus.

Crowd Fighting.name: Crowd Fighting
Crowd Fighting.flavor: You roll with your foe’s feeble attack, causing it to lash out at another nearby enemy.
Crowd Fighting.prerequisite: You must have training in Streetwise.
Crowd Fighting.trigger: An enemy misses you with a melee attack.
Crowd Fighting.target: One creature other than the triggering enemy
Crowd Fighting.effect: The target takes damage equal to 3 + your Dexterity modifier.

Single Out.name: Single Out
Single Out.flavor: Your fury in battle causes a nearby foe to quake with fear.
Single Out.prerequisite: You must have training in Intimidate.
Single Out.effect: The target grants combat advantage to you until the end of your next turn.

Sudden Sprint.name: Sudden Sprint
Sudden Sprint.flavor: You put on a burst of speed as you launch yourself toward a foe.
Sudden Sprint.prerequisite: You must have training in Athletics.
Sudden Sprint.effect: You move a number of squares up to your Dexterity modifier to a square adjacent to an enemy.

Get Up!.name: Get Up!
Get Up!.flavor: The aid you provide gets a dying ally back on his or her feet.
Get Up!.prerequisite: You must have training in Heal.
Get Up!.effect: The target can spend a healing surge. He or she can then stand up as a free action.

Ignore Weakness.name: Ignore Weakness
Ignore Weakness.flavor: A surge of inner strength helps you shrug off the lingering effects of your enemy’s attacks.
Ignore Weakness.prerequisite: You must have training in Endurance.
Ignore Weakness.trigger: You start your turn immobilized, slowed, or weakened by an effect that a save can end.
Ignore Weakness.effect: You make a saving throw with a +5 power bonus against the effect.

Line Breaker.name: Line Breaker
Line Breaker.flavor: You turn aside your enemies’ attacks as you advance across the battlefield.
Line Breaker.prerequisite: You must have training in Athletics.
Line Breaker.effect: You move up to your speed. During this movement, you gain a +5 power bonus to all defenses against opportunity attacks.

Veteran Gambit.name: Veteran Gambit
Veteran Gambit.flavor: By recognizing your enemy’s tactics, you effortlessly predict the foe’s next move.
Veteran Gambit.prerequisite: You must have training in Streetwise.
Veteran Gambit.trigger: An enemy hits you with a melee attack.
Veteran Gambit.effect: You gain a +2 power bonus to all defenses against the triggering enemy. The bonus lasts until the end of the triggering enemy’s next turn.

Clearheaded.name: Clearheaded
Clearheaded.flavor: Your mental resilience and training let you shake off an effect that hinders you.
Clearheaded.prerequisite: You must have training in Endurance.
Clearheaded.trigger: You start your turn dazed, dominated, or stunned by an effect that a save can end.
Clearheaded.effect: You make a saving throw with a +5 power bonus against the triggering effect.

Grim Presence.name: Grim Presence
Grim Presence.flavor: Your frightful presence forces your enemies back.
Grim Presence.prerequisite: You must have training in Intimidate.
Grim Presence.target: Each enemy in the burst whose Will is equal to or less than 12 + your level
Grim Presence.effect: You can push each target 1 square.

Hold Your Ground.name: Hold Your Ground
Hold Your Ground.flavor: You demonstrate your physical superiority by resisting a foe’s attempt to move you.
Hold Your Ground.prerequisite: You must have training in Athletics.
Hold Your Ground.trigger: You are pulled, pushed, slid, or knocked prone.
Hold Your Ground.effect: You are not pulled, pushed, slid, or knocked prone.

Temporary Relief.name: Temporary Relief
Temporary Relief.flavor: With a healer’s focus, you look past the pain that plagues you.
Temporary Relief.prerequisite: You must have training in Heal.
Temporary Relief.trigger: You take ongoing damage at the start of your turn.
Temporary Relief.effect: You do not take the ongoing damage this turn. In addition, you make a saving throw against the ongoing damage, with a +5 power bonus.

Relentless Advance.name: Relentless Advance
Relentless Advance.flavor: As you hew down one foe, you move forward to engage the next enemy.
Relentless Advance.trigger: You reduce an enemy to 0 hit points.

Slayer's Defiance.name: Slayer's Defiance
Slayer's Defiance.flavor: As the fight winds on, you channel your pain into each attack you make.
Slayer's Defiance.effect: Until the end of your next turn, whenever you hit or miss with a melee attack, the target of the attack takes damage equal to your Dexterity modifier. This damage is in addition to any damage dealt normally by the hit or miss.

Vicious Offensive.name: Vicious Offensive
Vicious Offensive.flavor: You smash into your opponent with such force that a nearby enemy can’t help but take notice.
Vicious Offensive.onHit:
1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you mark an enemy adjacent to you until the end of your next turn.
Level 21: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage.

Goading Maneuver.name: Goading Maneuver
Goading Maneuver.flavor: After a swift strike, you step to the side and draw another one or two foes into your trap.
Goading Maneuver.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you shift 2 squares. In addition, you mark one or two enemies adjacent to you until the end of your next turn.

Master's Edge.name: Master's Edge
Master's Edge.flavor: Your extensive experience helps you pick out the flaws in your opponent’s technique, letting you move to meet the enemy’s attacks.
Master's Edge.effect: Until the end of the encounter, whenever the target willingly moves to a square adjacent to one of your allies, you can use an opportunity action either to make a melee basic attack against the target or to charge the target.

Sidestep Maneuver.name: Sidestep Maneuver
Sidestep Maneuver.flavor: The enemy closes to strike, but you duck away and ready a nasty counterstrike.
Sidestep Maneuver.trigger: An enemy ends its move in a square adjacent to you.
Sidestep Maneuver.effect: You shift 3 squares to a square adjacent to the triggering enemy. You gain a +2 power bonus to your next attack roll against the triggering enemy before the end of your next turn.

Daunting Onslaught.name: Daunting Onslaught
Daunting Onslaught.flavor: You bring down your rage upon an enemy, frightening nearby foes with your brutality.
Daunting Onslaught.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage. The target and each enemy adjacent to either you or the target take a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn.

Crashing Assault.name: Crashing Assault
Crashing Assault.flavor: Your opponent flies back from your attack and crashes into other foes, sending them staggering.
Crashing Assault.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you push the target 3 squares and knock it prone.
Crashing Assault.onMiss: Half damage, and you push the target 1 square.
Crashing Assault.effect: Each enemy adjacent to the target takes damage equal to your Strength modifier. In addition, you push each enemy adjacent to the target 1 square.

Kirre's Roar.name: Kirre's Roar
Kirre's Roar.flavor: You let out an explosive roar, diverting your enemies’ attentions to you. The call steels you against the imminent assault.
Kirre's Roar.effect: You mark each target until the end of your next turn. In addition, you gain resistance to all damage equal to your Dexterity modifier until the end of your next turn.

Menacing Strike.name: Menacing Strike
Menacing Strike.flavor: You deliver a brutal blow to one enemy, causing your other foes to recoil in fear whenever you lunge at one.
Menacing Strike.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier + Dexterity modifier damage. In addition, whenever an enemy ends its move adjacent to the target, you can slide that enemy 1 square as an opportunity action. This effect lasts until the end of your next turn.

Shield Ripper.name: Shield Ripper
Shield Ripper.flavor: You strike past your enemy’s guard and hew through the foe’s defenses.
Shield Ripper.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to AC and Reflex (save ends).

Another Day.name: Another Day
Another Day.flavor: After suffering a hit, you leap out of your opponent’s reach to escape any subsequent attacks.
Another Day.trigger: You are hit by an attack.

Menacing Surge.name: Menacing Surge
Menacing Surge.flavor: Rushing forward, your opponents recoil before your menacing presence and your fearsome attacks.
Menacing Surge.effect: Until the end of your next turn, enemies take a -2 penalty to attack rolls while adjacent to you.
Menacing Surge.target: Each enemy you can see in the blast

Dust Storm Assault.name: Dust Storm Assault
Dust Storm Assault.flavor: You become a violent storm, flensing the flesh of all who try to stand up to your attacks.
Dust Storm Assault.primaryTarget: Each enemy you can see in the burst
Dust Storm Assault.effect: Before the secondary attack, you shift 6 squares to a square adjacent to the triggering enemy.
Dust Storm Assault.requirement: The power Dust Storm Assault must be active in order to use this power.
Dust Storm Assault.trigger: An enemy willingly moves adjacent to one of your allies within 3 squares of you or makes an attack that does not include you as a target while within 3 squares of you.
Dust Storm Assault.secondaryOnHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the secondary target falls prone.

Tyrian Battle Stance.name: Tyrian Battle Stance
Tyrian Battle Stance.flavor: You have mastered the combat stance used by gladiators in Tyr’s arenas, which lets you wade among your foes with impunity.
Tyrian Battle Stance.effect: You assume the Tyrian battle stance. Until the stance ends, you do not provoke opportunity attacks and you gain a +2 power bonus to AC and Reflex as long as you are able to make opportunity attacks.

Cruelest Chains.name: Cruelest Chains
Cruelest Chains.flavor: Your words or actions cause the enemy to draw close, giving you an opportunity to attack. If your foe ignores your summons, you vow to make it pay.
Cruelest Chains.trigger: An enemy able to take actions and within 4 squares of you makes an attack that doesn’t include you as a target.
Cruelest Chains.effect: The triggering enemy can shift 6 squares as a free action to a square adjacent to you. If the enemy makes this shift, you make the following attack. Otherwise, your next weapon attack against that enemy that hits before the end of your next turn deals 4[W] extra damage.

Bloodletter Stance.name: Bloodletter Stance
Bloodletter Stance.flavor: You strike at vital spots to draw your foe’s blood. With each hit, you aggravate the wounds and slowly destroy your enemy.
Bloodletter Stance.effect: The target takes ongoing 10 damage (save ends). In addition, you can assume the stance of the bloodletter. Until the stance ends, whenever you hit an enemy with a melee weapon attack, that enemy takes ongoing 5 damage (save ends).

Urikite Warmaster Stance.name: Urikite Warmaster Stance
Urikite Warmaster Stance.flavor: You emulate the warmaster gladiators of Urik with an aggressive stance that lets you punish enemies that come too close.
Urikite Warmaster Stance.effect: You assume the Urikite warmaster stance. Until the stance ends, you can use an opportunity action to deal damage equal to 5 + your Dexterity modifier to any enemy that ends its turn adjacent to you. In addition, while you are in this stance and adjacent to an enemy, you can shift 3 squares as a move action to a square adjacent to that enemy.

Executioner's Gambit.name: Executioner's Gambit
Executioner's Gambit.flavor: After you hit your enemy with a telling blow, you hold your weapon ready for a killing stroke if the enemy tries to escape.
Executioner's Gambit.onHit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage. You gain a +5 power bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls with opportunity attacks against the target until the end of your next turn.

Blind with Rage.name: Blind with Rage
Blind with Rage.flavor: Your strike causes blood to flow into your enemy’s face, and the foe lashes out blindly at anyone nearby as you call for your allies to back away.
Blind with Rage.onHit: 4[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is blinded (save ends). Until this condition ends, whenever any creature starts its turn adjacent to the target, the target must use a free action to make a melee basic attack against that creature.
Blind with Rage.effect: You and each ally adjacent to the target can shift 2 squares as a free action.

Demolishing Surge.name: Demolishing Surge
Demolishing Surge.flavor: After knocking down nearby foes once, you ready your weapon to upend any creatures that try to escape your wrath.
Demolishing Surge.effect: Until the start of your next turn, any enemy that willingly leaves a square adjacent to you falls prone.
Demolishing Surge.target: Each enemy you can see in the burst
Demolishing Surge.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you knock the target prone.

Final Challenge.name: Final Challenge
Final Challenge.flavor: You call out a challenge to your enemy. If it answers your summons, you bring your weapon around in a wicked strike. Otherwise, you charge toward it, delivering an assault that leaves a gaping wound.
Final Challenge.trigger: An enemy able to take actions and within 4 squares of you makes an attack that doesn’t include you as a target.
Final Challenge.effect: The triggering enemy can shift 6 squares as a free action to a square adjacent to you. If the enemy makes this shift, you make the following attack. Otherwise, you charge the enemy and make the following attack in place of a melee basic attack.
Final Challenge.onHit: 5[W] + Strength modifier damage, and ongoing 15 damage (save ends).

Feywild Guardian.name: Feywild Guardian
Feywild Guardian.flavor: You teleport from one place to the next to punish an enemy that ignores you.
Feywild Guardian.trigger: An enemy subject to your defender aura either shifts or makes an attack that does not include among its targets either you or an ally who has an active defender aura.
Feywild Guardian.effect: You teleport up to 2 squares to an unoccupied square adjacent to the triggering enemy and then make a melee basic attack against that enemy.

Glimmering Blade.name: Glimmering Blade
Glimmering Blade.flavor: After a successful strike, you teleport away to appear where your enemy least expects.
Glimmering Blade.prerequisite: You must be eladrin, and you must have the fey step power.
Glimmering Blade.effect: You assume the glimmering blade stance. Until the stance ends, each time you hit an enemy with a melee basic attack using a weapon, you can teleport up to 2 squares to an unoccupied square adjacent to that enemy.

Eldritch Tactics.name: Eldritch Tactics
Eldritch Tactics.flavor: Using your talent for teleportation, you take an ally’s place.
Eldritch Tactics.target: You and one ally in the burst

Bewitching Glare.name: Bewitching Glare
Bewitching Glare.flavor: You catch the enemy’s eye just as the foe makes an attack. What it sees in your gaze rattles it enough to interfere with its strike.
Bewitching Glare.trigger: One enemy in the burst makes an attack roll against an ally you can see.
Bewitching Glare.effect: The enemy takes a -2 penalty to the triggering attack roll. If the attack misses, you can pull the target 1 square. You cannot pull the target into hindering terrain.

Arcane Instincts.name: Arcane Instincts
Arcane Instincts.flavor: You anticipate an enemy’s attack and weave a shield to mitigate its worst effect.
Arcane Instincts.trigger: You take acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage.
Arcane Instincts.target: You and each ally in the burst
Arcane Instincts.effect: The target gains resist 10 to the triggering damage type until the end of your next turn.

Pitiless Grapple.name: Pitiless Grapple
Pitiless Grapple.sourceRef: Into the Unknown: The Dungeon Survival Handbook
Pitiless Grapple.flavor: You grip your foe mercilessly, striking terrifying blows as it struggles to escape.
Pitiless Grapple.requirement: You must have at least one hand free.
Pitiless Grapple.onHit: 3[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you grab the target. Until the grab ends, your melee attacks against the target can score a critical hit on a roll of 18–20.
